de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi śad pa gter gyi sgron ma brtul zhugs chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyud ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (sarvatathāgataguhyamahāguhyakoṣa-akṣayayanidhidīpa-mahāvratasādhanatantra-jñānāścaryavidyut cakra-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rim pa bzhi'i rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba (ālicatuṣṭayavibhaṅga-nāma)
sgrub chen bka' brgyad bder gshegs 'dus pa'i sgrub khog dngos grub gter mdzod gsal ba'i me long
tshe khrid rdo rje phreng ba'i gsol 'debs
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_gsang skor bla ma'i sgrub thabs
sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo (buddha-avataṃsaka-nāma-mahāvaipulya-sūtra)
'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi 'grel pa (āryabhadracaryāpraṇidhānaṭīkā)
snyan brgyud phur pa'i gnad tig gi mnan pa rdo rje'i ri rab
zab chos rig 'dzin thugs thig las/_sngon 'gro phan bde'i char rgyun
chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa (dharmadhātustotra)
'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-sarvabuddhāṅgavatī-nāma-dhāraṇī)
lha mo dbyangs can gyi bstod pa (sarasvatī [devī]stotra)

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor grub pa'i lung kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo (sarvatathāgatacittajñānaguhyārthagarbhavyūhavajratantrasiddhiyogāgamasamājasarvavidyāsūtramahāyānābhisamayadharmaparyāyavivyūha-nāma-sūtra)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_bla ma nor lha skyes mchog tshul bzang gi dbang chog nor bu'i chun po
gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub thabs (śrīḍākinīvajrapañjaramaṇḍalasaṃharaṇa-nāma-anusaraṇasādhana)
lha mo gnas mkhar gyi le'u rdzogs
mkha' 'gro gsang ba kun 'dus kyi mchod bstod nongs bshags mdor bsdus
'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo (ārya-sūryagarbha-nāma-vaipulya-sūtra)
grub thob me long rdo rje'i rnam thar dri log ma/
kA wA tsi'i ril sbyor
sde gsum nang skor yi dam khro bo'i dzapa? dmigs bsdus pa mchog gi thig le
tsha tsha gdab pa'i rim pa ([sācchanirvapaṇakrama])
de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag (mahāmudrātattvānākṣaropadeśa)
'phags pa ga ya mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-gayāśīrṣa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba (dakṣiṇāpariśodhani-nāma)
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa legs par bshad pa'i rgya mtsho/
'jam pa'i dbyangs dngos chos rgyal tshangs pa lha'i me tog gi byin rlabs dbang gi cho ga bdud rtsi'i sprin chen gyi mtshams sbyor
sbas pa'i rgum chung gi gzhung phyi mo/
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-vajracchedikā-nāma-prajñāpāramitā-mahāyāna-sūtra)
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa (bodhisattvagocarapariśuddhisūtrārthasaṃgraha)

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brid kyi rgyal po rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par bshad pa mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba (bhagavatsarvadurgatipariśodhanatejorājatathāgatārhatsamayaksaṃbuddhamahātantrarājavyākhyāsundarālaṃkāra-nāma)

thugs sgrub drag sngags kun 'dus kyi sgo nas gza' klu'i gdon 'grol bya thabs nag 'gros ma
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa (ārya-avalokiteśvarastotra)

ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byams las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba (ūrdhvajaṭāmahākalpamahābodhisattvavikurvaṇapaṭalavisarā bhagavatī-āryatārāmūlakalpa-nāma)
kun mkhyen chen po dri med 'od zer gyis mdzad pa'i phud rabs rgyas pa 'don stsol re skong bklag chog tu bkod pa
rdzogs chen gyi bdud ngos 'dzin dang spong tshul/_(bsam gtan bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i man ngag gi skor tshan gsum)
sku gsum rigs 'dus zab tig las/_snying po don gyi gtor dbang gi mtshams sbyor mdor bsdus pa bde chen myu gu
rten la gzungs 'bul ba'i lag len mdor bsdus pa
gu ru rin po che'i tshes bcu'i rnam thar gsol 'debs byin rlabs thig le
bdud kyi gcod yul dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin po che mu tig gi phreng ba/
dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
dpal ldan lha mo'i bsad las dgra bgegs bsgral chog
phyir bzlog ma chen mo (mahāpratyaṅgirā)
bdud mo srog gi gzer chung ma'i bsnyen bsgrub las gsum gsal ba/
'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-mahāmeghavātamaṇḍalaparivartasarvanāgahṛdaya-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bya ba'i rgyud chen po
byams pa'i sgrub thabs (maitreyasādhana)
rgyud kyi rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par sgrub pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms kyi rgyas par byed pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga ([puṣṭitantra-nāma-padasampradhāraṇavajravidāraṇīpauṣṭikahomavidhi])
don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rim pa yi ger bris pa (paramārthabodhicittabhāvanākramavarṇasaṃgraha)
'phags ma rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs (āryamahāmāyūrīsādhana)
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (śrīguhyasamājamaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
thugs rje chen po mun sel sgron me'i dbang bskur gsung rgyun khrom shog ma gsal bar bkod pa
man ngag thams cad kyi sdom
rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (vajratārāsādhana)
dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel yi ge nyung ngu (śrī-herukābhyudayamahāyoginītantrarājakatipayākṣarapañjikā)
don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa (saṃkṣiptāmoghapāśasādhana)
rnal 'byor gyi rim pa'i rgyud
grub thob chen po'i thug tig las:_phrin las ye shes snying po
phur pa'i bka' srung gi gsol mchod snying po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod kyi lde mig ces bya ba (prajñāpāramitākoṣatāla-nāma)
'gal ba skrag par byed pa'i las sna tshogs pa'i cho ga mgal pa me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ([viśvavirodhaghorakarmavidhī-alātacakra-nāma])
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga (śrī-cakrasaṃvarabalimañjarī)
bstan bcos tshigs su bcad pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba (gāthāsaṃgrahaśāstra-nāma)
dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po (śrī-paramādya-nāma-mahāyānakalparājā)
rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (vāyutattvabhāvanā-nāma)
dpal sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (śrīsitatārāsādhana)
'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-ratnākara-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
dur khrod brgyad ces bya ba (aṣṭaśmaśāna-nāma)
snyan brgyud yang phur sbrags ma'i zab tig gi rdzogs rim gud sbas
rdzogs chen sde gsum gyi brgyud 'debs bsdus pa
dam chos snying po skor lnga las/_yi dam bka' 'dus snying po'i dbang gi cho ga dngos grub yang snying
shes pas thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs/

'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-sarvatathāgata-adhiṣṭhāna-sattvālokena-buddhakṣetra-nirdeśana-vyūha-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
mdo tshogs chen 'dus pa'i bskyed rdzogs kyi rim pa ji ltar nyams su len pa'i bsnyen yig legs bshad skya rengs dang po'i snang ba/
si la sogs pa'i mtha'i bya ba (syādyantaprakriyā)
'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo zhes bya ba (amarakoṣaṭīkākāmadhenu-nāma)
brda sprod pa p'a ṇi ni'i mdo'i 'grel pa rab tu bya ba shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba (pāṇinivyākaraṇasūtra[vṛttiprakriyākaumudī-nāma])
rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs (dpal) kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud las bton pa (śrīhevajratantroddhṛtakurukullāyāḥ sādhana)
bkra shis kyi cho ga ([maṅgalavidhi])
sems rig dbye ba don gyi ngo sprod
ma ma'i spyi bskang rin chen spungs pa/
dpal gshin rje gshed kyi las mtha' gtad hrul nag po'i gzhung lag len zhal shes dang bcas pa
'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs (mārīcīsādhana)
gtsug lag gto bcos rgya nag gi gting rdzogs 'khor lo'i zhal shes
gzhan don slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i cho ga (śiṣyānugrahaṇavidhi)
dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (śrīraktayamārisādhana-nāma. )
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba (ārya-avalokiteśvarapadmajālamūlatantrarāja-nāma)
theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i sgron ma (mahāyānamelāyanapradīpa)
kun bzang thugs gter gyi gter srung spu gri rnam gsum ging chen bcas pa'i gtor chog mdor bsdus
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las/_gsang skor bka' brgyad rdzong 'phrang gi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs snang ba rang grol
byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (adhiṣṭhānamahākālasādhana-nāma)
'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-mahāmegha-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
zhi khro las kyi gal phreng /
dpal ldan lha mo'i spyan 'dren chung ba/
gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (sarvadhāraṇīmaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa (āryaprajñāpāramitāvajracchedikāṭīkā)
dga' ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa (ānandacakṣu-nāma-ṭīkā)
gsol 'debs lam khyer yon tan gter mdzod kyi gsal byed
gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag lam gyi rim pa rin po che rnam par bkod pa/_('bru dka'i don bkrol gsal byed me long rtogs ldan shAkya badzra gsungs/)
klu dam tshig gi rgyud phyi ma'i las phyung ba'i ti ka'o
shin tu gnyan pa ma mo'i khrag mdos
sgo ma bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin po che dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ([caturdvāramaṇḍalābhiṣekamaṇḍalavidhivimalaratna-nāma])
las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba (karmacaṇḍālikādohakoṣagīti-nāma)
'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (āryātārāsādhana)
dbang bskur spyi la 'jug pa'i lag len rnam 'byed mdor bsdus pa rab gsal zla ba'i me long
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba
byams pa bsgom pa'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs ([maitrībhāvanānusāreṇacittasthāpanopāya])
thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa'i dmar khrid rigs lnga las rat+na thod phreng mnyam nyid phyag rgya chen po'i khrid kyi zur rgyan bltas gsal
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha snyan brgyud zab mo thun mong min pa'i skor las:_'phags pa re man+ta'i sgrub pa
mdo sde rgyan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po gnyis kyi bshad pa (sūtrālaṃkārādizlokadvayavyākhyāna)
yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa (guṇāparyantastotra)
rten la nang gzhug 'bul ba'i lag len lugs srol kun gsal dri bral nor bu chu shel gyi me long
dpal thugs rje chen po rtag tu bya ba'i rnal 'byor ([śrīmahākāruṇikanityakriyāyoga])
dam chos sprul sku snying thig las/_bdud 'dul rdo rje gro lod kyi dbang chog byin rlabs sprin 'phro bka' rgya ma mtshams sbyor gyis brgyan pa

zur chung shes rab grags pa'i zhal gyi gdams pa brgyad cu pa bslab gsum rin po che'i gdams ngag gi mchan 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba/_(sde snod spyi dang mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi snying po'i man ngag/)
tshe dpag med gnam lcags rdo rje'i cha lag 'chi bslu'i gtor chen 'grigs chags su bkod pa 'chi bdag g.yul zlog
gter gsar rdo rje phur pa lha nag gri gug 'bar ba'i rgya can gyi rgyun khyer nyams len
sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba (chandoratnākara-nāma)
gsang thig snying po skor bdun las/_tshes bcu'i bla sgrub kyi las byang bklag chog tu bkod pa kun khyab thig le
dra mthun khyad 'phags ngang pa'i rgyal po/
dpal mgon legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs   rgyas pa/las bzhi rnam rol
rdo rje dpal chen/_dpal chen khro rgyal/_ye shes mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bshags pa/
ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga (sarvadurgatipariśodhanamarahomamaṇḍalopāyikā)
'gong po ar la gtad pa'i man ngag
rdzogs pa chen po snying thig spros bcas kyi dbang lce btsun gyis mdzad pa/
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pha rol rgol 'joms kyi dbang chog bdud bzhi'i g.yul 'joms
khyim pa rjes su 'dzin pa so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i cho ga thar lam rab gsal/
tshe sgrub gsang ba 'dus pa'i smin byed dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa khrigs bkod 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho
'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa zhes bya ba (āryavajrapāṇinīlāmbaradharasarvamaṇḍalavidhipūrṇa-nāma)
rten gsum rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga dge legs 'dod 'jo/
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba me long lta bu'i sgrub thabs/
phyag na rdo rje las:_rwa srung dug khrag rdo rje'i go khrab las tshogs dang bcas pa
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las:_sme ba brtsegs pa'i sgrub thabs nyams grib kun sel
sdud 'grel yum la 'jug pa'i legs bshad las mdo dang bstan bcos sbyar tshul ma pham zhal lung /
slob dpon bi ma la mi tra'i sgrub thabs lam zab snying po'i dbang bskur byin rlabs gter mdzod
thun drug tu sdom pa gsum gyi bslab bya skyong tshul gyi yi ge
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las/_blo 'phel shes rab ral gri'i rjes gnang gi yi ge ye shes ral gri
bla ma dgongs 'dus kyi bka' srung chos srung gter srung gi gtor chog rgyun khyer bsdus pa
rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa (mūlāpattiṭīkā)
'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-nagara-avalambikā-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
dbang don nges 'byed/
ye shes rab 'bar las/_sde brgyad srung ba rdo rje'i gur khang
he ru ka rol pa'i rgyud
yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga (śatākṣaravidhi)
kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho ga (hevajramaṇḍalakarmakramavidhi)
gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi phur pa yang gsang spu gri'i rgyun khyer
'chi med klong gsal rdo rje'i srog sgrub las tshe dbang 'chi med snying po bklag chog tu bkod pa 'chi med bcud 'dzin
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma khros ma nag mo sgrub cing mchod pa'i las byang mkha' spyod du bgrod pa'i bde lam
khros ma nag mo'i gtor 'bul/
bsam gtan man ngag
rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_mdo byang rab tu gsal ba
sbyin sreg gi cho ga (homavidhi)
dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa ([maṇḍalāvatārasaṃkṣiptakalpa])
rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba (vikalpaparihāragītikā-nāma)
gza' mchog chen po rA hu la yi skong gso khrag mtsho 'khyil ba
dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel bshad (madhyāntavibhāgaṭīkā)
chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel bshad mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba (abhidharmakośaṭīkālakṣanānusāriṇī-nāma)
lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs (mārīcīdevīsādhana)
nor bu rin po che'i rgyud
rdzogs chen ma rgyud mkha' 'gro gsang ba lam khyer las:_gter gyi byung khungs sbas tshul gsang ba'i lo rgyus dang:_gsang ba'i rnam thar khrid gzhung chen mo
'chi med yang snying kun 'dus kyi bsnyen yig tho byang
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-mañjuśrīsvākhyāto nāma-dhāraṇī)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dka' 'grel (āryamañjuśrī-nāmasaṃgītipañjikā)
sman bla'i dbang gi sngon 'gro'i tshab la byin rlabs shog bkra ma
bon rtsis phra men skor rnams las:_dbang drag 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs
tshe gcig byang chub sgrub pa'i gseng lam yang dag bde chen snying po las chos thams cad kyi sngon 'gro thun mong ba
stag tshang rdo rje phur pa che mchog gi las byang dbang bskur bsgyur kha'i zur 'debs khyer bder bkod pa
dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs (śrīheruka[-nāma-]sādhana)
phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i gtam (caturviparyaya[parihāra]kathā)
gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa (aṣṭamahāsthānacaityavandanāstava)
rdo rje phur bu rog lugs kyi sgrub thabs las byang dngos grub char 'bebs/
'jam dpal nA ga rak+sha'i thun mong ma yin pa'i snyan brgyud zhal shes
slob ma la shes rab bskyed pa ([śiṣyaprajñotpādana])
zab bdun mngon spyod phur pa las/_bstan srung shwa na chen po'i yongs rdzogs gtor ma'i dbang chog mthu rtsal nus pa'i bcud 'beb
dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba (śrībhagavadabhisamaya-nāma)
'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa (āryalaṅkāvatāra-vṛtti)
rgyal ba rgya mtsho lha lnga'i gsol 'debs
rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i las kyi cho ga (vajrayānamūlāpattikarmaśāstra)
tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba (gaṇacakravidhi-nāma)
'byung skong gi las bye brag pa'i 'dod gsol
ral pa gcig ma'i sgrub thabs (ekajaṭāsādhana)
zab chos zhi khro dgongs pa rang grol gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs thugs dam gnad bskul
tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan gyi 'grel bshad shin tu yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba (pramāṇavārttikālaṃkāraṭīkāsupariśuddhā-nāma)
gu ru drag po mthing nag gi gdab las zlog pa bstan dgra 'joms pa'i spu gri
ched du brjod pa'i tshoms (udānavarga)
dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (śrīhevajramaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud
'chi med 'phags ma'i snying thig las/_bla sgrub byin rlabs snying po'i dbang bskur bltas chog tu bkod pa byin rlabs bcud
gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo
dpal mgon po nag po dngos grub bstan par gzigs pa man ngag gi rgyud chen po
sde gsum spyi skor rab gnas cho ga
gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul snying po bkod pa
'phags pa chos nyid rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid las mi g-yo bar tha dad par thams cad la snang ba'i mdo (ārya-dharmatāsvabhāvaśūnyatācalapratisarvāloka-sūtra)
khyung gi sgrub thabs zab mo
so sor thar pa'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa (pratimokṣasūtraṭīkāvinayasamuccaya)
rdzogs pa chen po bka' 'dus kyi:_rtsa sgrub snying po kun 'dus las:_yongs rdzogs bka' rgya gdams gtad
tshe dpag med dwangs ma bcud 'dren gyi bsnyen sgrub gsal byed nyung ngu bdud rtsi'i snying po
'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma (sarvabhūtabali)

rnam par snang mdzad chenpo mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul ba byin gyis rlob pa shin tu rgyas pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs (mahāvairocanābhisambodhivikurvatī-adhiṣṭhānavaipulya-sūtra-indrarājā-nāma-dharmaparyāya)
ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs (raktaikajaṭāsādhana)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub rig 'dzin bde 'dus las:_tshe sgrub rdo rje snying po 'od kyi drwa ba
klu nag po'i rgyud
rje rin po che'i rtags bstod/
zab bdun rgyud zab sgyu 'phrul las/_tshe skor phrin las rgyas pa dang 'brel ba'i dbang bskur gsal byed bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun
don rnam par nges pa shes rab ral gri mchan/
karṇa ri'i glu ([kāṇerigītikā])
drag po'i sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud
dpal gsangab snying po'i brgyud pa rin po che la gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_lam rim smon lam phun tshogs dpag bsam sprin gyi me tog
stag sham bdud 'dul drag mo'i las tshogs sa lha'i gter bum sgrub pa'i gsal byed nor bu'i sgron me
'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chi med 'byung ba/
skyes mchog rdo rje legs pa'i sgrub thabs dbang dang bcas pa
klu nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung shig
mnol bsang lha chab sngon mo'i khog dbub spyi chings mdor bsdus/
klong chen snying thig gi bla sgrub thig le'i rgya can gyi smin byed ye shes mchog sbyin gyi mtshams sbyor nyung ngur bkod pa bde chen thig le
maN+Dal rgyas pa tshom bu so bdun ma
do ha mdzod kyi glu (dohakoṣagīti)
ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (gaṇḍakhadgayamārisādhana-nāma)
rin po che spyi gnad skyon sel thig le kun 'dus kyi rgyud
'khrul zhig sangs rgyas dbon po'i rnam thar nyid kyi mdzad pa nor bu'i gsal byed/
thub chog byin rlab gter mdzod kyi rgyab chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba stod cha/
dam pa bde gshegs kyis mdzad pa'i theg dgu spyi chings kyi rtsa ba gsung rab rin po che'i mdzod/
nang skor rig 'dzin bco lnga yi:_bskyed rim bsgom pa'i byang bu
legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las sgrub pa'i thabs rim par phye ba (susiddhikaramahātantra-sādhanopāyika-paṭala)
dbang skur gyi cho ga pad+ma rA ga'i phreng ba las/_gter gsar phyag rdor gtum po'i dbang dang byab khrus gdon 'grol gyi rim pa
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (sarvatathāgatatattvasaṃgraha-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
dpal ldan lha mo nag mo mchod pa'i cho ga dgra bgegs rdul brlag
gsang 'dus bla ma'i las byang snying po rab gsal
gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa (maṇibhadrāyayakṣasena-kalpa)
rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga (pratiṣṭhāvidhi)
rtsa gsum spyi 'dus snying tig las:_phrin las ye shes lam bzang
dpal nag po chen po khams gsum 'jigs byed kyi rgyud
drag dmar 'o bran lugs kyi sgrub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs/
zab pa skor bdun las/_yang gsang thugs kyi phur gcig gi smin byed khyer bde rnam gsal du bkod pa rig mchog gsang ba'i bcud 'beb
rdo rje phag mo'i zab rgya las/_zab lam khrid kyi nyams len snying por dril ba zung 'jug them skas
he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa ([herukaviśuddhi])
rdor sems thugs kyi sgrub pa las/_rgyun gyi rnal 'byor khol phyung
gnod sbyin ma mo re ma ti gcer bu bong zhon ma rtsa ba'i rgyud
dgongs gter thugs kyi klong gsal gyi zur rgyan gnam chos nyid nas zur du bsgrigs pa sman bla'i cho ga bai DUr+Ya'i chu rgyun
srid pa 'pho ba (bhavasaṃkrānti)
bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
ye shes rab 'bar gyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
dpa' mo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (ekavīrayoginīsādhana-nāma)
'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-aṅgulimālīya-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba (saṃsiddhimahāśrīherukopāyikā-nāma)
gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i phrin las
klu'i gdon las grol bar byed pa sbrul 'dzin gsang ba zhes bya ba ([nāgagrahanirmocanaguhyasarpadhāraka-nāma])
'phags pa dgongs pa śab mo nges par 'grel pa'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa (āryagambhīrasaṃdhinirmocanasūtraṭīkā)
bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ([rakṣācakra])
dpal dzambha la'i sgrub thabs (śrījambhalasādhana)

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i bshed pa (sarvadurgatipariśodhanatejorājatathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddha-nāma-kalpaṭīkā)
kun tu bzang po klong drug pa'i rgyud
zab bdun rtsa gsum gdams skor las:_'chi med tshe yi las byang pad+ma'i phreng ba
thugs rje chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bsnyen yig nyung gsal
pad gling tshe sgrub rdo rje phreng ba'i tshe sgrub dang tshe dbang gsung rgyun bzhin bkod pa
rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus dong sprugs kyi brgyud 'debs/
rmi lam brtag pa (svapnekṣā)
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba (vajrabhairavagaṇacakra-nāma)
'phags pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (mahāsaṃnipātād mahāyānasūtrān tathāgataśrīsamaya-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
drag po rang byung rang shar chen po'i sgrub thabs
sgrub chen bka' brgyad rang byung rang shar gyi snying po gnam zhal don khrid
'jam dpal gyi tshogs mchod/
'jam dpal gyo ba'i 'khor lo (mañjuśrīcalacakra)
bla ma rig 'dzin rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma rnams dang phas kyi lha lngas skyob pa'i man ngag gdams pa
gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i (gos sngon po can gyi) sgrub thabs ([guhyapativajrapāṇisādhana])
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (vajravidāraṇā-nāma-sādhana)
thub chog byin rlab gter mdzod kyi rgyab chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba smad cha/
'gres byang /
dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag (śrīraktayamārijīvatattva-nāmopadeśa)
phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs (nīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇisādhana)
'brel med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba (asaṃbandhadṛṣṭi-nāma)
'dul ba'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa (vinayasūtraṭīkā)
mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa'i bsdus don (abhisamayālaṃkāravṛttipiṇḍārtha)
byang chub sems dpa'i las dang po pa'i lam la 'jug pa bstan pa (bodhisattvādikarmikamārgāvatāradeśanā)
a phreng ka phreng gi sngags kyi rim pa zhes bya ba (ālikālimantrajñāna-nāma)
snga 'gyur sdom rgyun mkhan brgyud kyi rnam thar gsal sgron me'i kha skong nges shes 'dren pa'i pho nya/
rnal 'byor la 'jug pa (yogāvatāra)
ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs (jñānasattvasādhana)
dkyil 'khor 'grel chung gser gyi yang zhun
shes rab blo 'phel mi brjed gzungs thob
dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sngags kyi cha zhes bya ba (śrī-caturpīṭhakhyāta-tantrarājomantra-aṃśa-nāma)
ral gcig ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs (ekajaṭāsādhana)
bdag med ma gcig pu'i sgrub pa'i thabs (kevalanairātmāsādhana)
dug nad thams cad la mchog tu bsngags pa gser gzungs snyan brgyud ma'i lo rgyus gdams ngag dang bcas pa
rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs (raktayamāntakasādhana)
dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po (śrī-vajramaṇḍālaṃkāra-nāma-mahātantrarājā)
gnubs lugs gshed dmar gyi sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang nyung gsal snying po/
rten cing 'grel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa (pratītyasamutpādahṛdayakārikā)
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po
rdzogs pa chen po ngal gso skor gsum gyi dkar chag pad+ma stong ldan/
rtsa gsum spyi yi las byang kun gsal me long
rin po che 'od/
yang zab dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi bsnyen yig mdor bsdus su bkod pa nyer mkho'i don gsal
dpal gsang chen padma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa (śrī-rahasyanalinī-nāma-mahāṭīkā)
khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs ([bhṛkuṭīsādhana)])
gshin rje dashed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed (raktayamāriyantratattvanirdeśaka)
las gzhung gzhan dang mi sbrel skabs tshogs mchod
dpal lha mo nag mo gser gyi sbram bu zhes bya ba'i rgyud
'khor lo'i dpe'u ris/
gza' ngan pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rgya mtsho sprin zhes bya ba ([duṣṭagrahanirvāraṇavidhisāgaramegha-nāma])
'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa gsang snags chen po'i rgyud
grub pa dam pa'i lam nges pa (siddhisanmārganirṇaya)
de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa (tattvakārikā)
rdo rje phur by gsang ba'i rtsa ba rnal 'byor chen po yang dag pa'i rgyud
bdud kyi gcod yul dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin po che mu tig gi phreng ba stod cha/
dkyil 'khor gyi klong /
dpal ldan mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po drag sngags gsang ba spu gri'i smin byed chu 'babs su bkod pa mthu stobs rab 'byed
ye shes rab 'bar las:_rdo rje brtsegs pa srung ba'i rim pa
khro bo stobs kyi rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po
bya ba'i phung po zhes bya ba (kriyāskandha-nāma)
bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i cho ga bde ba can du bgrod pa'i shing rta
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs

'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-tathāgataguṇajñāna-acintyaviṣaya-avatāranirdeśa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa (āryatārāstotra)
rin po che snang byed kyi rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_phyi skor bla ma'i sgrub thabs
phrin las kyi klong /
sngags srung e ka dzA Ta'i skong gso
'phags pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dpa' bo gcig (du grub) pa'i sgrub thabs (āryamañjuvajrasiddhaikavīrasādhana)
bod khams skyong ba'i brtan ma bcu gnyis mchod tshul gangs ljongs rjes brtse rab bskul
bsrung ba lnga'i cho ga ([pañcarakṣāvidhi])
rin po che dbang gi phreng ba
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (āryaprajñāpāramitopadeśa-nāma)
rdzogs pa chen po'i spyi chings/
dpa' bo gcig pa he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (ekavīraherukasādhana-nāma)
seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs (siṃhanādasādhana)
tshig bdun sgrub thabs zab mo las:_bde chen rgyal mo'i mchod gsol
phur pa gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen po
bla ma bka' brgyad yongs 'dus las/_rig 'dzin spyi sgrub yang tig snying po lnga dang de'i dbang bskur gyi yi ge dri med pad+ma'i phreng ba
khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs (bhṛkuṭīsādhana)
'chi med tshe sgrub bu ston gong khug ma'i skor rnams
bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhing sbyong gi cho ga dang rjes su 'brel ba'i gzhan phan phrin las kyi rim pa bde ba can du bgrod pa'i myur lam
dpal chen rdo rje phur pa rgyud lugs kyi bdag 'jug byin rlabs rol mtsho/
'phags ma 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (āryamārīcīsādhana-nāma)
dpal lha mo dmag śor gyi man ngag ([śrīdevīpārvatyupadeśa])
nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi man ngag (vasudhārādhāraṇyupadeśa)
srog gi byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
sa bdag lto 'phye chen po brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa nyes pa kun sel
rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs (bhaṭṭārakāryaikādaśamukhāvalokiteśvarasādhana)
bsgrub bya skrag pa'i las chu thigs zhes bya ba ([sādhyaraudrakarman jalabindu-nāma])
'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs (ārya-aparimitāyurjñāna-sādhana)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītiguhyāpannopāyikāvṛtti-jñānadīpa-nāma)
ma rig mun sel nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud
gsang bdag dregs pa 'dul byed las tshogs dam sri'i glud mdos
lung ston pa tsandra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel pa (candravyākaraṇavarṇasūtravṛtti)
phyugs nad srung gso'i man ngag zab dgu bsdus pa
mdzes ma 'bum bskul bsdus pa/
rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa ([kulalokeśvarabhāvanākrama])
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba (sādhananidāna-nāma-śrīcakrasaṃvarapañjikā)
dam can skyes bu chen po'i sgrub skor
dga' rab rdo rje'i snying tig las/_yi dam zhi ba rdo rje sems dpa'i brgyud 'debs bde chen sprin phung
bka' brgyad dregs pa kun 'dul las/_don gyi smin byed snying po khrigs su bsdebs pa bde chen mchog ster
bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs (nairātmāsādhna)
byang gter drag po dbu dgu ye shes rang gsal gyi don dbang bklag chog tu bkod pa ye shes 'od kyi zhun thigs
zab bdun mngon spyod phur pa las:_gri 'dul gyi cho ga
'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-caturdharmanirdeśa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bod khams bde thabs chos bcu yi:_bstan pa srung ba'i skor bzhi las:_gshin rje 'jigs byed rol pa
rta mchog rol pa'i snying tig
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs (prajñāpāramitāsādhana)
rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (hayagrīvasādhana-nāma)
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i man ngag dpal lam gyi rim pa zhes bya ba'i dka' ba rnam par 'grel pa lam mchog gsal ba'i sgron me/
mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i chu spyin ([nāmasaṃgītitarpaṇa])
mtshan brjod klog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (nāmasaṃgītivacanopadeśa-nāma)
'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po (bhūtaḍāmara-mahātantrarājā-nāma)
ser lam gcod pa'i tsakra dpe'u ris
drag sgrub rdo rje'i thigs pa las:_'dzab dgongs dzapa? bskul dzapa? byang las mtha' rgyal bsen gcun thabs dang ar gtad bcas pa
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi śab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel pa ([āryamañjuśrīgambhīravyākhyā])
rdzogs chen sde gsum gyi phrin las byang bu khrigs sdeb kyi tshogs mchod la nye bar mkho ba'i skong bshags kun bzang mchod sprin
bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs (bhagavatīprajñāpāramitāsādhana)
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i lam de kho na nyid nges par bsdus pa/
rtsa rlung thig le'i rgyud
bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud
thub chog byin rlabs gter mdzod
rje karma pak+shi zhal gzigs ma'i las byang
paN+Di ta bi ma las mdzad pa'i gsang ba snying po'i 'grel chung biN+DAr+tha/
mthong grol 'khor lo'i lag len gsal byed shel dkar thur ma
byang chub kyi gzhung lam zhes bgyi ba (bodhipaddhati-nāma)
'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (āryatārāsādhana)
zag med kyi chos sde tshan nyer gcig gis bstod pa/
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i gzhal med khang gi rnam par bzhag pa gsal ba'i sgron me'i rtsa ba/
sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig
pad+ma'i zhal gdams grol thig mthong ba rang grol las:_rang lus a nu'i tshogs mchod
yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag 7'jam mgon blo gros mtha' yas pa'i sde'i ring lugs dar zhing rgyas pa'i ched du smon pa drang srong bden par smra ba'i dbyangs snyan
'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa ([ārya-samantabhadra-aṣṭottaraśatakanāma-dhāraṇī-mantrasahita])
dpar rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs (zhes bya ba ) (śrīvajravārāhīsādhana-nāma)
zhig gling gsung dgra gnan gshin rje rlung sgrub kyi las gzhung lag len zhal shes mthong brgyud dang bcas pa khrigs chags su bsgrigs pa bstan dgra 'joms byed

bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu pa bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba (vimalaprabhā-nāma-mūlatantrānusāriṇī-dvādaśasāhasrikālaghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkā)
rin po che bcud kyi yang snying spros gcod rtsa ba'i rgyud
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rdo rje'i las kyi rim pa/
dpal ye shes kyi mgon po ma ning 'khor bcas kyi las byang las bzhi myur 'grub
de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa (tattvasārasaṃgraha)
sbyin sreg gi cho ga (homavidhi)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa ([ārya-mañjuśrīkumārabhūta-aṣṭottaraśatakanāma-dhāraṇī-mantra-sahita])
chos 'khor skyong ba'i bstan srung btsan rgod chen po'i phrin las che btsan dgyes pa'i rngam glu
paN+Di ta ma ti nas brgyud pa'i 'jam dbyangs dkar po'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang las tshogs dang bcas pa
bla ma bstan gnyis skor gsum gyi snying po'i don dbang bklag chog tu bkod pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pa
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngan par rtogs pa zhes bya ba (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītiṭīkāsārābhisamaya)
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dbang gi brgyud 'debs/
lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa (devīprabhādharādhiṣṭhāna)
'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-ṣaṇmukha-nāma-dhāraṇī)
'phags pa (rdo rje) khro bo stobs po che'i sgrub thabs (āryavajrakrodhamahābalasādhana)
dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rin po che padma r'ag'i gter zhes bya ba ([śrīḍākārṇavatantramaṇḍalacakrasādhanaratnapadmarāganidhi-nāma])
ser ba zlog pa'i khro rgyal rdo rje mchu'i las byang rdo rje'i gur chen
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
dpal rta mgrin nag po lcags ral can gyi chos skor las:_lo rgyus rin chen phreng ba
rdor sems thugs kyi sgrub pa'i gcod khrid kyi khrid yig bskyud byang du spel ba 'khrul rtog dbyings grol
smon tshig gzhan phan chos kyi blo gros kyi gsung ldeb/
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha'i grub chen Dom+bi pa sogs grub thob so so'i bla sgrub
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba khro bo'i sgrub thabs bde chen char 'bebs kyi snying po'i don bsdus/
dpa' bo gcig bu grub pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po (siddhi-ekavīramahātantrarājā-nāma)
pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-mahāsannipātaratnaketudhāraṇī-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rje btsun sgrol ma la bsten pa'i dgra jag 'ching ba'i man ngag gi lag len
dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba (śrī-jñānatilaka-yoginītantrarājā-paramamahādbhutaṃ-nāma)
rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi 'khor lo'i dpe'u ris
'phags pa śa ma tog bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-karaṇḍavyūha-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
mkha' 'gro snying thig gi bka' srung
li'i yul lung bstan pa ([kaṃsadeśavyākaraṇa])
thugs rje chen po bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi bsnyen yig bklags pas kun shes
gu ru'i bdud rtsi bum chung
thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa'i bka' srung dpal mgon ma ning gi srog dbang dang gtor ma la brten pa'i srog dbang bcas
sku lnga rang bzhin dbyer med kyi glegs bam
rdzogs pa chen po rang byung rang shar gyi snying po bcud bsdus rig pa'i dbang blta bder bkod pa ye shes rang shar
o rgyan gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi rdo rje'i gsung 'khrul pa med pa'i gsol 'debs le'u bdun ma lo rgyus dang bcas pa
phyogs skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ([daśadikpālamaṇḍalābhiṣekavidhi])
dpal rnal 'byor ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga ([śrīyoginīśāntihomavidhi])
lce btsun chen po'i bi ma la'i snying thig gi smin byed lag len gsal bar bkod pa gser 'gyur rtsi mchog
theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul la 'jug pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa rgyal sras lam bzang /
rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi bshad pa (vajrāmṛititantraṭīkā)
dpal bka' 'dus chos kyi rgya mtsho'i las byang gi mchod phreng cung zad spros pa
rigs byed ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs (śuklakurukullāsādhana)
tshe g.yang 'gugs pa'i phrin las tshe bsod 'dod rgu'i dpal ster gyi smin byed dngos grub dpal ster
srid pa ma mo sgang shar gyi rgyun gyi phrin las snying por dril ba bde chen thig le
ye shes rab 'bar las:_sde brgyad dregs pa'i mchod gsol me rlung rab 'khrugs
thugs rje chen po 'khor ba las sgrol las/_bcu gcig zhal nam mkha' rgyal po gtso 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi las byang dngos grub gter 'byung snying po bsdus pa
thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i smin byed kyi cho ga 'gro ba kun 'dul
dpal spyan ras gzigs khros pas ser ba bzog pa'i cho ga ([śrīroṣaṇāvalokitakaraka-nivāraṇavidhi])
rdor sems thugs kyi thig le las/_bdud rtsi sman gyi byin 'beb dngos grub chu 'dzin

rgyud kyi rgyal po (chen po) dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skyed ma zhes bya ba (śrīsarvabuddhasamayogaḍākinījālaśambaramahātantrarāja-nāma-maṇḍalopāyikāsarvasattvasukhodayā-nāma)
'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i 'grel pa (āryātyayajñāna[-nāma]mahāyānasūtra-vṛtti)
mchog gling dag snang seng gdong zlog pa'i 'gres byang
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las:_thod sgrub yid bzhin bang mdzod
tshigs su bcad pa brgya pa (śatagāthā)
phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa/
dam pa sangs rgyas kyi lugs 'jam dpal smra seng gi sgrub rjes
thugs rje chen po gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang bshad rgyas bsdus 'phri bsnan gyis gsal ba
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa (sarvatathāgatoṣṇiṣavijayā-nāma-dhāraṇī-kalpa)

yon tan bdud rtsi'i mchog tig

gang ḍi'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa (gaṇḍīstotragāthā)
'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-mañjuśrīvikurvāṇa-parivarta-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)

gtsug tor gdugs dkar gyi cho ga

nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud
ka kha 'i do h'a zhes bya ba (kakhasya dohā-nāma)

chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa (abhidharmakośaśāstrakārikābhāṣya)

bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga (bhagavacchrīcakraśambaramaṇḍalavidhi)

snying po nges par bsdu ba zhes bya ba (hṛdayanikṣepa-nāma)
'dus pa mdo ba'i dbang gi brgyud 'debs/
'jam dpal las kyi gshin rje khro chu sman gdong bse sgrom ma'i dug dbang bklag chog tu bkod pa ha la'i zhun 'dril
phyi rol gyi don grub pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa (bāhyārthasiddhikārikā-nāma)
tshe dpag med gnam lcags rdo rje dngos grub kun 'dus kyi dbang bskur bklag chog tu bkod pa 'chi med thig le
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba (eka-akṣarīmātā-nāma-sarvatathāgata-prajñāpāramitā)
mdzad bcu dbang bzhi dang sbyar ba

zhing lha tshangs pa'i mchod chog g.yang skyabs dang 'brel pa gzhan phan mtha' yas dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang
brjod med don bshags
dge sbyong gi k'a ri k'a lnga bcu pa'i tshig gi brjed byang du byas pa (śramaṇapañcāśatkārikāpadābhismaraṇa)

(gshin rje gshed nag po'i) sbyin sreg gi cho ga ([kṛṣṇayamārihomavidhi])
rje btsun khros ma'i phrin las kyi sgo nas tshe 'das rjes 'dzin gnas lung dang ro sreg gi cho ga sgrib gnyis mun sel
'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo (ārya-arṣapraśamanisūtra)
rig 'dzin thugs thig gi las tshogs rdo rje phur pa'i gtor chog dug zer reg phung gi phrin las bdud las rnam rgyal
thugs rje chen po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi myong grol ril bu'i sgrub thabs gzhan phan bdud rtsi
rten gyi gzungs gzhug sgrub pa'i cho ga dge legs nor bu'i gter mdzod
gos sngon po can gyi dngos grub nye ba zhes bya ba (nīlāmbaropasiddi-nāma)
sgrub chen bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa'i go don lag len dang bcas pa'i yi ge rin chen sgron me
thugs rje chen po ngan song rang grol las phyi sgrub dang 'brel ba'i phrin las bklag chog tu bkod pa pad dkar rgyas pa'i 'dzum zer
'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa sgrub pa'i thabs (āryasitātapatrāparājitāsādhana)
gnam chos las hur drag mo kag zlog rnam dgu dang bcas pa'i dbang bskur bka' gtad kyi lag len gto mkhan gso thig
sngon 'gro me tog phreng mdzes kyi 'grel pa/
bla ma'i thugs sgrub yid bzhin nor bu'i las byang le'u gsum pa gu ru badzra b+ho Tas gnam lcags 'bar ba'i brag logs rta mgrin sgrub phug mkha' 'gro'i gsang mdzod chen mo nas gdan drangs pa
bon rtsis phra men skor rnams kyi dbang gi zur 'debs
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che kun tu bzang po gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud
yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba ([aṅgasamaya-nāma])
gzhi lam 'bras bu sgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nyams len zhes bya ba (sthānamārgaphalamahāmudrābhāvanā-nāma)
gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (advayasiddhisādhana-nāma)
bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byed pa'i bshad pa (sugatamatavibhaṅgabhāṣya)
tshogs gsog gi rim pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i sdom pa gsum gyi gso sbyong thar pa'i them skas las rgyun gyi nyams len bsdus pa/

bod rje 'bangs la brdzangs pa'i 'phrin yig ([bhoṭasvāmidāsagurulekha])

bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i bskyed rdzogs chung ba'i mdangs skong

'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po
zhi khror dgyes pa dzaṃ bha la'i sgrub thabs (ucchuṣmajambhalasādhana)
gtor ma cha gsum gyi cho ga
'jam dpal gshin rje'i thugs tig las/_rgyun gyi rnal 'byor snying po
gsang sngags spyi chings kyi gdams ngag zab mo them yig med pa'i skor las:_rtsa gsum bla rdo srog tig yongs 'dus
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo skad cig gis bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (śrī-kālacakraṛiṭisahajasādhana-nāma)
rdzogs pa chen po bka' 'dus kyi:_rtsa sgrub snying po don 'dus las:_dbang rnams snying por bsdus pa
las brgya tham pa (karmaśataka)
rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga ([vairocanasādhanopāyikā])
bcom ldan 'das sh'a kya thub pa'i bstod pa (bhagavacchākyamunistotra)
kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me long gi rgyud
tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan gyi 'grel bshad shin tu yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba (pramāṇavārttikālaṃkāraṭīkāsupariśuddhā-nāma)
grub chen thang stong rgyal po'i lugs kyi nad brgya sman gcig ril bu dkar dmar gyi gzhung gsal byed dang bcas pa
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dpa' bo gcig bu'i sgrub thabs (śrīcakrasaṃvaraikavīrasādhana)
zab mo bdud kyi gcod yul gyi skyabs sems tshogs bsags sngon gtor gyi rim pa/
yon tan rin po che'i mdzod dga' ba'i char/
bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs khrid kyi yi ge sku gsum lam rim mchog gi sgo 'byed
bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel (piṇḍīkramaṭippaṇī)
badzra gu ru nyams su len pa'i thabs man ngag yid bzhin nor bu tog gi blo gros
tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad (pramāṇaviniścayaṭīkā)
rgyud sna chogs las btus pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga (nānātantroddhṛtabalividhi)
chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa don gyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba (abhidharmakoṣabhāṣyaṭīkātattvārtha-nāma)
rang gnas chen po rgya mtsho ar la gtad pa/_/man ngag brgya bcu bzhi pa/
bla ma'i thugs sgrub rig 'dzin bde 'dus las:_sde lnga lcam dral gyi mchod 'phrin bsam don lhun grub
dpal nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (śrīmahākālamaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
byang chub kyi smes rmad du byung ba'i rgyud
lta bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i do ha'i glu zhes bya ba (bhāvanādṛṣṭicaryāphaladohagītikā-nāma)
gnod sbyin bshan pa dmar nag gi sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa gter kha gnyis ldan gyi lugs bzhin bkod pa
rnam thos sras kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (vaiśravaṇasādhana-nāma)
ma rgyud snying po don gsum gyi smin byed byin rlabs snying gi khrag rlangs rgyas par bskur ba'i tshul gsal bar byed pa dngos grub b+han+d+ha'i rgya can
mi'i dpyad kyi bstan bcos bsdus pa ([tanūvicāraṇaśāstrasaṃkṣepa])
ma ti ci tra'i glu ([mātṛceṭagītikā])
dpal ldan sngags kyi srung ma sde bdun dang sde lnga'i sgrub thabs dbang dang bcas pa
gangs ri'i khrod kyi klog pa nyan bshad pa rnams kyi snyan du bsrings pa thos bsam 'chi med bdud rtsi/
bla ma drag po yang gsang me'i 'khor lo zhi drag gi dbang chog gnam lcags zil pa bdud rtsi'i bum bzang gsal bar byed pa
dpal spyan ras gzigs kyi nad bsrung ba'i cho ga ([śrīavalokitarogarakṣāvidhi])
rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dka' 'grel zhal nas brgyud pa zhes bya ba (ḍākinīvajrapañjara[-mahā]tantrarājasya pañjikā[-prathamapaṭala-]mukhabandha-nāma)

'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba (āryamahāpratisarāvidyāvidhi-nāma)
dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba (śrījñānatilakapañjikāguhyatattva-nāma)

tshig bdun sgrub thabs zab mo'i smin grol lag len mtshams sbyor gyis brgyan pa pad+ma'i lding khang
thugs rje chen po pad+ma sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/_dam can lcam dral gyi bka' gtad gsal byed phrin las lcags kyu

sman bla longs sku'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i dbang bskur bla ma'i gsung bzhin bkod pa dngos grub sgo 'byed

'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba (ārya-sandhimālamahātantra-bodhisattvamahāviniścayanirdeśād mahāmaṇiratnakauśalyanirdeśamahāpariṇāma-nāma-rājā)
nyang gter gu ru mtsho skyes rdo rje'i tshe sgrub 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa dbang bskur bcas bklag chog tu bsdebs pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun
lha chen dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa las 'brel rtsal gyi gter ma'i lugs bzhin brjod pa

pad+ma 'od gsal mdo sngags gling pa'i zab gter rtsa gsum sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/_bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun yab yum gyi phrin las 'dod rgu'i sprin gyi ting 'dzin chen po dang 'brel ba'i phrin dbang las tshogs kyi gsal byed zur rgyan nor bu rmad du byung ba'i char rgyun

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor grub pa'i lung kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa/

rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs (vajrāsanasādhana)
yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs (ṣaḍakṣarasādhana)

tshe sgrub gsang ba 'dus pa'i las byang pad+ma'i phreng ba kha skong bcas phyi sgrub rang lugs bklag chog tu bkod pa 'chi med go cha
sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang gi dka' gnad zin bris lo chen d+harma shrIs mchog sprul kun bzang pad+ma legs grub kyi dris lan du bstsal pa'i skor yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyun bzang
dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud

klong gsal rdo rje'i snying po las:_dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa gter gyi 'dod 'jo
gtor ma'i las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba (balikarmakrama-nāma)
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla śer zhes bya ba (padārthacandrikāprabhāsa-nāma-aṣṭāṅgahṛdayavivṛtti)
mchan khung gi sbyor ba (kakṣaputa)
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga (sarvakarmāvaraṇaviśodhana-nāma-maṇḍalavidhi)
bi ma snying thig gi spros med dbang dkyil/

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed me yi spu gri'i bdag mdun srung zlog gi 'don sgrig gab sprad nas bltas chog tu bkod pa

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong du sprul pa rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med par thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs (ārya-avalokiteśvarasahasrikabhujalocananirmāṇavistāraparipūrṇāsaṅgamahākāruṇika-dhāraṇī)

brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga (sthiracakrabhāvanā)
mgon po tshogs bdag gi mjug chog
bla ma rgyal ba 'dus pa dang thugs kyi nor bu thun mong gi drag sgrub me'i 'khor lo'i dbang bskur gyi yi ge dpa' bo gcig grub

'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo'i rnam par bshad pa (āryasaṃdhinirmocanasūtravyākhyāna)
rtsa dkyil sgrub dbang gi las byang khol bton bklag chog tu bkod pa/

'dus mdo'i rgyun khyer nyer bsdus/
khro bo yang dag sgron ma/

phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud ces bya ba (nīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇiyakṣamahārudravajrānalajihvā-tantra-nāma)
rdo rje theg pa'i spom po'i ltung ba (vajrayānasthūlāpatti)
rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa (jinamārgāvatāra)
'chi med 'phags ma'i snying thig las/_bla sgrub byin rlabs snying po'i las byang bklag chog tu bsdebs pa byin rlabs bcud 'dren
theg pa chen po'i lam gyi rim pa (mahāyānapathakrama)
seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs (siṃhanādasādhana)
kun bzang dgongs pa kun 'dus las:_rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs
bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud
b+h+rU~M mtshan rdo rje rwa gdengs thog mda'i rgya can gyi nang tshan rdo rje gro bo lod gyi chog bsgrigs gnam lcags 'bar ba
gsang thig bla ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs mchod skabs bshags skong sogs nyer mkho grub thob thugs tig las khol du phyung ba
gnam chos thugs gter las stobs chen ma hA ba la'i sgrub thabs
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud kyi mdo mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba (śrīvajrabhairavatantrasūtraṭippaṇī-nāma)
gsang chen sngags kyi theg pa'i dam tshig gso sbyong gi cho ga kun tu bzang po'i dgongs rgyan
mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi snying khrag klong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud/
rdzogs pa chen po'i chig chod kun grol zhes bya ba'i rgyud
ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud
rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa nyams kyi man ngag thig le gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba ([vajragītibhāvanopadeśatilakakanakamālā-nāma])
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla śer zhes bya ba (padārthacandrikāprabhāsa-nāma-aṣṭāṅgahṛdayavivṛtti)
khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la bstod pa (āryācala-krodharājastotra)
rig pa klong rdzogs hyi rgyud
gnod sbying dgong gsum pa'i rgyud
he ru ka'i sgrub thabs (herukasādhana)
lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa
tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo (brahmajāla-sūtra)
dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba (madhyamakāvatāra-nāma)
dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (śrīvajrayoginīsādhana-nāma)
bcud len rab tu sbyor ba'i rgyal po:
mdung dmar can yang gsang phyag mtshan bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa
bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba (bhagavadd-hevajrasādhana-abhisamayakramārthaprasanna-nāma)
gnas brtan spyan drang ba (sthaviropanimantraṇa)
snyan brgyud yang phur zab tig las/_'gal rkyen zlog byed drag po gtor ma'i las rim mthu stobs rdo rje'i thog char
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs (ārya-uṣṇīṣavijayāsādhana)
kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs (hevajradvibhujasādhana)
bka' srung mchod chog:
DAk+ki 'bum bskul/
slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi rnam par thar pa gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge yid ches gsum ldan
sgron ma gsal ba mdor bshad pa'i sa bcad snying gi me long zhes bya ba (pradīpadīpaṭippaṇīhṛdayādarśa-nāma)
byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa (bodhicittavivaraṇa)
zur bza'i thugs dam skor drug las/_bla sgrub thugs kyi yang snying gi dbang bskur byin rlabs chu rgyun mtshams sbyor gyis brgyan pa
bod skad du dgra bo gsod pa mtshon cha thog gi 'khor lo/
bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa las/_zhi ba rigs brgya'i phrin las bklag chog tu bkod pa rin chen gsal ba'i sgron me
khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (kṛṣṇayamārikrodharājāvadhipāragasādhana-nāma)
rin chen gter mdzod chen po'i smin grol 'bogs pa'i skabs kyi phyag len nyer mkho'i zur 'debs mtshams sbyor rigs bcas nyung gsal du bkod pa 'dod rgu 'jo ba'i gter bum pod gnyis pa
ma hA gu ru 'chi med sku gsum rigs 'dus kyi dbang gi chog khrigs 'chi bdag g.yul 'joms
mngon pa chos kun nas btus pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba (abhidharmasamuccayavyākhyā-nāma)
glegs bam bklag pa'i thabs (pustakapāṭhopāya)
snyan brgyud phrin las phur pa'i gnad tig gi las byang phrin las rnam par rol pa'i dga' ston mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan bi dza ha raM//
(gshin rje) gshed nag (po'i) 'khor lo'i man ngag ([kṛṣṇayamāricakropadeśa])
sngags rgod lok+t+ri'i srung zlog gsad pa'i man ngag rdo rje'i thog 'beb
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal rnon po la bstod pa
'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs (āryajāṅgulīsādhana)
gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad pa ([guhyasamājatantranidānagurūpadeśabhāṣya])
sgyu 'phrul chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba (mahāmāyā-tantra-nāma)
yang gsang karma drag po'i brgyud 'debs khyer bde
gter gsar thugs rje chen po 'khor ba dong sprug gi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
man ngag gi sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang stobs sgrub pa zhes bya ba ([upadeśasiddhayogyāyurbalasādhana-nāma])
'jam dpal nag po thugs kyi yang zhun gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
snying thig bkol ba'i rgyud
gnod sbyin nor bdag gsang ba'i rgyud
klu gtor gyi cho ga (nāgabalividhi)
ngag gi dbang phyug la bstod pa (vāgīśvarastotra)
'dul ba bsdus pa (vinayasaṃgraha)
rab tu gnas par byed pa'i cho ga'i lag len gsal bar byed pa legs par bshad pa'i rol mtsho/
rtsa gsum dgongs 'dus zab mo gter gyi mdzod las:_gsol 'debs rgyud bskul gyi bkol byang
sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gnyis pa
'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-sarvakarma-avaraṇaviśodhanī-nāma-dhāraṇī)
ngo sprod rin po che sprad pa'i rgyud
'gres byang /
chos skyong thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga (sarvadharmapālabalividhi)
thugs rje chen po mun sel sgron me'i las byang skal bzang 'dod 'jo
dpal mgon ma ning nag po las:_gtor ma la brten pa'i dregs pa'i srog dbang bsdus pa
bskyed pa bzhi ldan gyi gto chog
thun mong gi dngos grub (rin po che) sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag ([sāmānyasiddhisādhanopadeśa])
tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba (āryākoṣa-nāma)
byang gter phur pa spu gri'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga lag len mdor bsdus pa rig mchog lam 'dren
rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs (vajrasarasvatīsādhana)
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa (sarvatathāgatastotra)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi cha lag 'jam dpal pha rol rgol 'joms las tshogs dang bcas pa rdo rje pha lam
snyan brgyud yang phur sbrag ma'i bskang ba nor bu'i sprin phung
bla ma kun 'dus yid bzhin nor bu'i gsol 'debs le'u bdun pa
sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa (ṣaḍaṅgayoga-nāma-ṭīkā)
dpal lhan cig skyes pa grub pa zhes bya ba (śrīsahajasiddhi-nāma)
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs (prajñāpāramitāsādhana)
dge slong gi dang po dri ba (bhikṣuvarṣāgrapṛcchā)
ser ba srung ba'i man ngag a tsa ra dmar po'i lugs kyi rdo 'khor
gter srung chen mo rdo rje gshog rgod ma'i gsol mchod kyi rim pa
mdze nad gso ba ([kuṣṭhacikitsā])
'jam dpal yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs (vajrānaṅgamañjuśrīsādhana)
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_gsang skor yi dam khro bo'i dbang chog
man ngag brtsegs pa gri gug gi rgyud
bka' gter zung 'jug mkha' 'gro seng gdong ma'i gtor dbang rmi lam ma
bcam ldan 'das 'phags ma drug sel ma'i rtog pa (āryajāṅgulyā bhagavatyāḥ kalpa)
byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i theg pa
gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (uṣṇīṣabhavasitātapatrāvidhi-nāma)
smra ba'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu zhes bya ba (vacanamukhāyudhopama-nāma)
dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs (zhes bya ba ) (śrīvajravārāhīsādhana-nāma)
gser mdog can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs (kanakavarṇaprajñāpāramitāsādhana)
dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs (siddhaikavīrasādhana)
dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i cho ga ([śrī-]vajrasattvapūjāvidhi)
rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba (ārya-tārābhaṭṭārikānāma-aṣṭaśataka)
pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i s'atstsha gdab pa'i cho ga ([pāramitāyānasañca(ka)nirvapaṇavidhi])
thig le spros pa'i rgyud
bsre ba'i tho byang /
rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba rtsad gcod
dam chos sprul sku'i snying thig gi rdzogs rim khrid kyi sngon 'gro'i ngag 'don khyer bder bkod pa kun bzang bde lam
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga shib mo (pratītyasamutpādahṛdayakalpa)
zhal gyi lung (mukhāgama)
(dpal 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed pa'i 'phags pa bhugma'i sgrub thabs ) ([śrītrailokyavaśaṃkarāryabhugmasādhana])
mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba (koṭi-niṣṭhaphalapradīpa-nāma)
bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnam par dbye ba (svādhiṣṭhānakramaprabheda)
yang gter phag mo dkar mo'i thugs tig ye shes 'khor lo'i brgyud 'debs
rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen me ral gcig ma'i rgyud
byang gter gnod sbyin nor lha yongs rdzogs kyi chu sbyin 'bul ba'i cho ga bsam 'phel nor bu'i chu rgyun
skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa dang bdun cu pa'i chos kyi bdag po rnams la gsol 'debs  brgyud ldan bla ma'i byin rlabs dpal ster/
dga' rab rdo rje'i snying tig las:_yi dam khro bo'i sgrub pa
zab bdun rgyud zab sgyu 'phrul las:_tshe skor phrin las rgyas pa
ka na pa'i glu ([kānhapādagītikā])
gting bshags bya ba ldeb/
'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa (ārya-maitrīnāma-aṣṭottaraśataka-dhāraṇī-mantrasahita)
tsunde'i sgrub thabs (cundāsādhana)
nges don snying po'i gnad mdor bsdus pa'i sa bcad/
'ja' tshon gter byon dpal mgon rgyas pa'i las tshogs nor bdag lha gsum gyi g.yang skyabs cho ga longs spyod char 'beb
phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i tshig don gyi 'grel pa legs bshad kun las btus pa/
'jig rten dbang phyug h'a la h'a la'i sgrub thabs (hālāhalalokeśvarasādhana)
rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs (vajravārāhīsādhana)
sgrub chen bka' brgyad bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs smin grol dpal skyed
lha chen gyi rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa
ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs (vāgīśvarasādhana)
klu mo'i sgrub thabs (nāgīsādhana)
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs (prajñāpāramitāhṛdayasādhana)
rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub pa'i thabs (vajraśṛṅkhalāsādhana)
'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs (āryamaitreyasādhana)
man ngag dum dum khrigs dum bu bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa/
rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma
lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa (hastavālavṛtti)
rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo (mahāmayūrīvidyārājñī)
'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me/
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi 'jam dpal drag po'i las tshogs 'chi bslu bgyid pa la bka' gtad
'ja' tshon lugs kyi seng gdong ma'i dbang rA ga a s+yas byas pa
klong gsal rdo rje'i snying po las/_rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi phrin las dbang bskur dang bcas pa khrigs bkod gnam lcags ral gri
mi 'khrug pa'i bsgom bzlas/
yang gsang mkha' 'gro'i snying khrag lta bu snyan brgyud zab mo las phyung pa rgyun gyi nyams len shin du gces pa shog dril gong khug ma
zab chos rig 'dzin thugs thig las:_rtsa gsum skong gso kun bzang mchod sprin
lha mo nor rgyun gyi sgrub thabs (vasudhārāsādhana)

dus ngan snyigs ma'i sems can thams cad nad kyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i man ngag gu ru drag po mthing ga'i sgrub thabs zab mo dgongs pa'i gter las phyung ste 'gro ba'i don dus la babs tshe bkod par byas so:
bla chen yab sras dril sgrub kyi las byang chog khrigs byin rlabs sprin phung
rtsa gsum gtor 'bul phrin las myur 'grub
zab chos zhi khro dgongs pa rang grol las:_sku gsum bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi gsol 'debs dug gsum ma spang rang grol
khro rgyal rta mgrin nag po'i las byang dregs pa tshar gcod
mna' las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs ([śāpavijayasādhana])
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga zhes bya ba (vajravidāraṇīsnānavidhi-nāma)
bkra shis don kun grub pa'i dbyangs snyan/
gnam chos las 'phags pa re man+ta'i gsol kha
yan lag sbom po brgyad kyi Di ka / (No transliteration)
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa (ārya-aṣṭasāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā)
mchod rten gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (stūpavidhi-nāma)
thugs kyi sgron ma
pad+ma gsang ba'i thig le'i rtsa rgyud pad+ma zab pa'i bsdus 'grel pad+mo'i drwa ba
na rag dong sprugs phyag rgya gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zab don nying khu/
yan lag med pa'i rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs (vajrānaṅgamañjughoṣasādhana)
tshe sgrub gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub mchod chen mo'i skabs byar nye bar mkho ba'i zur 'debs bdud rtsi'i ljon shing
rin po che gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud
o ḍi y'a na'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs (oḍḍiyānamārīcīsādhana)
thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa (prajñopāyaviniścayasiddhi)
yi dgas thams cad rdo rjes bcings pa (sarvapretavajrapāśa)
pad+ma gsang ba'i thig le las:_rtsa rgyud pad+ma zab pa
sgrub chen bka' brgyad dregs pa kun 'dul gyi mchod phreng cung zad rgyas par spros pa bde chen char 'beb
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla śer zhes bya ba (padārthacandrikāprabhāsa-nāma-aṣṭāṅgahṛdayavivṛtti)
bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa las/_rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'brel ba'i tshe'i sgrub pa phrin las dbang bskur bcas nyams su len bder bkod pa 'chi med bcud sbyin
de bzhin rigs kyi sgrub thabs gsang ba me dpung thugs kyi rgyud
rtog pa las gsungs pa'i lha mo rigs byed (ma'i) sgrub pa'i thabs (kalpoktakurukullā(devī)sādhana)
lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba (viśuddhadarśanacaryopadeśa-nāma)
mi sdug pa bsgom pa'i rim pa ([aśubhābhāvanākrama])
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītisādhnopāyikā)
lta ba yang dag sgron ma
thugs rje chen po gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang bzhi 'bring du bskur ba gtor dbang yid bzhin nor bu mtshams sbyor mdor bsdus kyis brgyan pa
dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba rang la gnas pa'i rgyud
man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba/
rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las 'byung ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa ([rājaparikathāratnāvalināmodbhavapraṇidhānagāthāviṃśaka])
de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba (tattvaratnāloka)
gter mgon zhal bzhi pa'i drag po'i gtor ma'i las rim rdo rje'i thog mda'
sman sgrub gnad kyi zhal gdams

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdud pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba (sarvatathāgatatattvasaṃgrahamahāyānābhisamayanāmatantravyākhyā-tattvālokakarī-nāma)
shi 'dre glud bsngo
thig gdab pa'i rim pa dka' pa gcod pa zhes bya ba ([kaṣṭacchedaka-nāma-sūtrakrama])
bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i brgyud 'debs
dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbang gi cho ga byin rlabs char 'bebs/
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (mahāyakṣasenāpatinīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇimaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
'jam dpal gzhin rje 'khrul 'khor nag po sdig pa snying 'dzings gsang ba'i rgyud
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_lung bstan gces pa'i lde'u mig
dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba (śrīvajravārāhīkalpasarvārthasādhasādhana-nāma)
bde gshegs spyi bstod sems brtse ma
klong gsal rdo rje snying po las/_'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs dang dbang chog klu chog gdon khrol bcas pa bdud rtsi'i zil thigs
phur pa rgyud lugs las brgyud pa'i bsol 'debs byin rlabs shing rta/
tshig bdun sgrub thabs sna tshogs pa:_dril sgrub pad+ma'i snying po
lce btsun chen po'i bi ma la'i zab tig gi sngon 'gro'i ngag 'don chu 'bab tu bkod pa ye shes gsang rdzogs
utstshuṣḥm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (ucchuṣmā-nāma-sādhana)
rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu
legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs (subhagāsādhana)
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba (śrīcakrasaṃvaraṣekaprakriyopadeśa-nāma)
phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa (pañcaskandhaprakaraṇa)
smon lam mu gnyis ma ([praṇidhānaparyantadvaya])
yi dam gyi rgyud bka'i tha ram
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las:_nyes pa kun sel byin rlabs kyi sgron me
ma mo dam ldan gyi lha mo rdo rje re ma ti'i dgyes bskyed mchod sprin du spro ba'i thabs nyung ngur bsdus pa/
yang zab rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i gdams pa ye shes 'od kyi snying po'i bsnyen yig mdor dril du bkod pa zab gsal bdud rtsi'i snying po
sha śa nag po'i sgrub thabs (kṛṣṇapiśācasādhana)
ye shes rab 'bar las:_rtsa ba'i sgrub pa
(bdun tshigs kyi cho ga ) ([saptaparvavidhi])
phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga (vajrapāṇimaṇḍalavidhi)
ae ka dza ti thugs kyi gsang ba sa ti nag po'i rgyud
klong sde rdo rje zam pa'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa khrigs su bkod pa/
drag po ngan sngags kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud
gsar rnying spyir 'gro ba'i dbang bshad bye brag so so la 'khyog mtshams kyi dper brjod dang bcas pa
brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs (sthiracakrasādhana)
gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa
yi ge med pa'i rgyud chen po
gtum po dregs pa kun 'dul las:_gza' chog gdug pa kun sgrol
sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa (buddhanāmasahasrapañcaśatacaturtripañcadaśa)

dbang mdor bstan pa (ṣekoddeśa)

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdud pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba (sarvatathāgatatattvasaṃgrahamahāyānābhisamayanāmatantravyākhyā-tattvālokakarī-nāma)
dpal bde mchog gi (rtsa rgyud kyi) rgya cher bshad pa tshig don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba ([padārthaprakāśikā-nāma-śrīsśmbaramūlatantraṭīkā])
dpal mgon legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs las bzhi'i snye ma/
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (āryapañcaviṅśatika-prajñāpāramitāmukha-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las:_'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'jigs pa kun sel
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa ([śatasāhasrikāprajñāpāramitābṛhaṭṭīkā])
sa snying dang brtan ma sbrags sgrub kyi bum gter sgrub tshul shin tu bsdus pa phan bde'i yang snying
bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa (stutyatītastava)
tshe sgrub gsang ba 'dus pa'i lhan thabs 'chi bslu 'chi bdag zhags gcod
grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa thig le 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba ([pañcāśatsiddhāvadānatilakaprabhāvalī-nāma])
'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa (ārya-saddharmānusmṛtyupasthāna)
gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gi ri bo zhes bya ba ([paravidyāstambhanakāñcanagiri-nāma])
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las/_nang skor yi dam khro bo'i bskyed rim dang byang bu khrigs su bsdebs pa

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po khro rdo rje'i rigs kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rnal 'byor grub pa'i rgyud zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (sarvatathāgatacittaguhyajñānārthagarbhavajrakrodhakulatantrapinathārthavidyāyogasiddhi-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rdo rje gro bo lod kyi bsnyen yig rta ljang dbang po
mngon po mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs (nāthākṣobhyasādhana)
byang chub kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i 'grel pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba (bodhyāpattideśanāvṛttibodhisattvaśikṣākrama-nāma)
rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs (vajravārāhīsādhana)
bde gshegs yongs 'dus drag po kI la ya'i byin rlabs thugs kyi dbang bskur mtshams sbyor gyis brgyan pa gnam lcags zhun thigs
lam zab bla ma sgrub pa las:_tshe sgrub rdo rje'i snying po
u rgyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs (uḍḍiyānamārīcīsādhana)
yang zlog rdo rje pha lam gyi rgyun khyer phas rgol phyir zlog
rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i sku rn po che dbyig gi sgron ma
gtum po dregs pa kun 'dul las:_gdon khrol ngar glud kyi cho ga kha skong sogs dang bcas pa
bka' brgyad bsnyen thabs phan bde'i gter bum
zhi khro na raka dong sprugs kyi skong bshags thugs rje'i zla 'od
sgrub chen bka' brgyad bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi phrin las bsdus pa snying po don gsal khrigs su bsdebs pa ye shes rol pa
'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-vikurvāṇarājaparipṛcchā-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs
'phags pa nges pa dang mi nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-niyata-aniyatagatimudra-avatāra-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rigs pa'i thigs pa'i phyogs snga ma mdor bsdus pa (nyāyabindupūrvapakṣasaṃkṣipti)
grwa pa mngon shes kyi gter byon phyag rdor gtum po dmar po'i sgrub thabs
brda' don lam zab pad+ma'i snying gtam bla ma'i rnal 'byor bcas
thugs rje chen po ngan song rang grol gyi dbang bskur cho ga 'grigs chags su bkod pa zla ba rgyas pa'i 'dzum zer
gsang thig snying po'i skor las:_rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
zab chos rig 'dzin thugs thig gi las byang pad+ma'i dgongs rgyan
gsang thig snying po'i skor las:_bla sgrub 'od kyi thig le
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha las byung ba'i khro bo rdo rje mchu'i ngag khrid zin bris
snga 'gyur bka' ma'i bdud rtsi gsang nan gyi 'grel ba/
las 'phro gter brgyud kyi rnam bshad nyung gsal ngo mtshar rgya mtsho
phyag rgya chen po'i dmar khrid ye shes rang grol
stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ([śūnyatābhāvanopadeśa])
rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud
bla ma'i srog 'khor dar dkar po la byin rlabs can gyi rdzas kyis bri ba
rang gnas rgyal po'i 'grel pa/
dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i smon lam ([śrīsusiddhikaratantrabhāṣitapraṇidhāna])
nang dbang gi chu bo las sgyu 'phrul khro ba'i dbang gi cho ga rmog ston rdo rje dpal gyi gsung /
chos rgyal chen po'i bstod pa gangs can ma/
gshin rje gtsug lag 'khor lo'i rgyud
drag po lha gsum gyi gsol 'debs rdo rje'i me 'od 'bar ba
byang gter thugs sgrub rjes chog
mkha' 'gro ma thugs rje kun sgrol gyi yig rgod
grol thig bla sgrub kyi sman mchod

bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu pa bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba (vimalaprabhā-nāma-mūlatantrānusāriṇī-dvādaśasāhasrikālaghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkā)
sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo (buddha-avataṃsaka-nāma-mahāvaipulya-sūtra)
rtsis kyi gtsug lag las 'byung ba'i lha rnams mchod pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus
'phags pa sh'akya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs
phur pa rgyud lugs las bsnyen sgrub thams cad kyi mdzod khang rig 'dzin gzhung lam/
rog lugs kyi phur pa'i brgyud 'debs/
grub mtha' chen po bzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa mdo tsam phye ba nges don dgongs pa gsal byed/
'gugs pa/
zab mo gcod kyi bskyed bzlas dang phung po mchod sbyin tshogs bcas bdud rtsi'i char rgyun/
sku'i rgyud pad ma 'khyil ba
las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba (karmakrama-muktāvali-nāma)
d+hA ki gtsug gi rgyan gcig ye shes mtsho rgyal gyi sgrub pa
rang rtags rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs bdun pa las kyi bye brag bcu ([svaliṅgavajrasādhanasaptakadaśakarmaviśeṣaḥ])
h'a la h'a la'i sgrub thabs (hālāhalasādhana)
grub thob chen po'i thugs thig las/_khrag 'thung bde gshegs 'dus pa'i tshom bu tshogs sgrub kyi lag len gsal bar bkod pa rig 'dzin dgyes pa'i rol mo
bla 'gugs kyi sngags bzla ba
phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi klu gtor gyi cho ga (nīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇi-nāgabalividhi)
grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba (caturaśītisiddhasambodhihṛdaya-nāma)
dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bzang po yong su bzung ba zhes bya ba (suparigraha-nāma-maṇḍalopāyikā-vidhi)
'byung lnga'i skong ba'i 'gres byang
de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba (tattvaprakāśa-nāma)
dpal gsang ba'i snying po'i 'grel pa spar khab kyi mchan 'grel nyi ma'i 'od zer/_nam mkha' dpal bos mdzad pa/
dpal yang dag he ru ka'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs/_rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas kyi gsung /
dpal bka' 'dus kyi skong bsdus rin chen sil ma
smin gling gur drag gi las bum sgrub chog
rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga (vajraśṛṅkhalāsādhanopāyikā)
'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa (vinayavibhaṅga)
dpal 'jig rten mgon po yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs ([śrīlokanāthaṣaḍakṣarasādhana])
'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs (lokanāthasādhana)
'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba (ārya-amoghapāśamaṇḍaladevagaṇastotra-vimalaprabhā-nāma)
byams pa'i sgrub thabs (maitreyasādhana)
dbang gi rab tu byed pa (śekaprakriya)
gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i tshul las snang ba lhar bsgrub pa rong zom chos bzang gis mdzad pa/
yang gsang bla ma'i sgrub pa thig le'i rgya can gyi brgyud 'debs byin rlabs char 'beb
pad+ma'i zhal gdams rtsa gsum mthong ba rang grol las:_gshin rje'i yang zlog spu gri reg gcod
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dka' 'grel bsdus pa zhes bya ba (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītipañjikā-saṃgraha-nāma)
rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba (vimuktimārge dhūtaguṇanirdeśa-nāma)
byang chub sems skyob pa
tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi dka' 'grel (pramāṇavārttikapañjikā)
yi dam spyi yi byang chog shi shog gson shog gang byed kyang 'brel tshad don ldan bde chen zhing gi lam bzang
gter gsar brngan gtor bca' thabs
rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs (vajrasattvasādhanopāyikā)
dpa' bo gcig sgrub pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa (siddhaikavīratantra-ṭīkā)
chos dbang bka' brgyad gsang rdzogs skong zlog 'gres byang
rdo rje tshe'i skor las:_gnam lcags rdo rje'i srog sgrub kyi rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
rtsa ltung bcu bzhi'i 'grel pa sngags kyi spyi khrus/ (No transliteration)
sgyu 'phrul skyab sems
'phags yul dbus 'gyur ma thu ra'i rgyal rigs kyi sman pa ra ghu n'a tha'i gdams pa ([āryadeśamagadhamathurākṣatriyabhiṣagraghunāthāmnāya])
zab mo gsang ba yongs 'dus las:_mkha' 'gro ye shes mtsho rgyal gyi gsang sgrub pad+ma nor bu'i rgya can
'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa (āryabhadracaryāpraṇidhānarājaṭīkā)
glud rabs snang srid spyi bskang chen mo
rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud phyi ma
gar tshe'i brgyud 'debs
rdzogs pa chen po stobs gsum gyi gdams ngag gi bsdus don sogs chos tshan dgu/
'phags pa gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa (āryanīlāmbaradhara-nāma-tantraṭīkā)
sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgyad cu bdun pa
'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i phrin las rdo rje rtse brgya pa log rtog bdud dpung pham byed/

rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud

o rgyan pad+ma'i thugs bcud mnga' bdag yab sras kyi thugs dam rgyun gyi nyams len las:_dmigs med rtsa gsum kun 'dus kyi dbang chog
chos kyi rgya mo sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las:_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum gyi yang gsang rtsa ba'i thugs sgrub gsal byed thugs kyi nor bu
'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i gzhal med khang gi rnam par bzhag pa gsal ba'i sgron me'i 'grel pa/

padma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma dra ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i cho ga (padmāvalokiteśvarasya padmajālakrameṇa bhagavanmaṇḍalapūjāvidhi)
de kho na nyid ye shes yang dag par grub pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa de kho na nyid bshad pa zhes bya ba (marmakalikā-nāma-tattvajñānasaṃsiddhipañjikā)

rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga (vajrayoginīpūjāvidhi)
