chos skyong zab mo skor dgu las/_ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa phyi sgrub gtor ma'i byin rlabs dngos grub thig le
rwa srung zab mo bla ma rgya phur bu'i gter ma
'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs (āryamaitreyasādhana)
skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa'i spyi don/
'phags pa sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-buddhasaṃgīti-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
gshin don gyi cho ga gang rung la sbyar chog pa'i gri khrol man ngag byang bu
snga 'gyur bstan pa rgyas pa'i smon lam gyi 'grel pa phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan/
gcod kyi dbang sdud/
tshe sgrub 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum bzang 'chi bdag bdud 'joms
phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba (mahāmudrāratnābhiṣekacakra-nāma)
dpal gsang ba snying po zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam dag gser phreng /
le'u bco brgyad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa (aṣṭādaśapaṭalavistaravyākhyā)
rdzogs chen ma rgyud mkha' 'gro gsang ba lam khyer gyi dbang gi cho ga bai DUr+Ya'i do shal
nor bu phra bkod chen po'i rgyud gsang ba
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa ([śrīguhyasamājatantropadeśasāgarabindu])
gcud phur gsum gyi rgyab yig gnad bsdus sgron me bi mas mdzad/
lhag ma byin gyis rlabs pa/
rig pa rang grol che po'i rgyud
rin po che gser gyi rgya mdud
lcags khang bskul pa che ba/
mtsho rgyal snyan brgyud phur pa'i bdag bskyed nyung ngur bsdus pa rig 'dzin lam gyi rnal 'byor/
ye shes rab 'bar las:_grib dang mi gtsang ba thams cad sel ba'i thabs
ched du brjod pa'i tshoms kyi rnam par 'grel pa (udānavargavivaraṇa)
gser 'od dam pa mdo sde dbang po'i smon lam ([suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrapraṇidhāna])
gu ru drag po dmar nag me'i phreng ba can gyi las tshogs sde brgyad dang rgyal bsen 'byung po rnams la spring yig phyag rtags rdo rje'i rgya can
nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa (viṃśatikāvṛtti)
bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa (maṅgalagāthā)
sbyin sreg ([homa])
'ching ba rnam grol gyi man ngag ces bya ba (bandhavimuktopadeśa-nāma)
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las kyi phreng ba
chos dbang gter byon bla sgrub cha rkyen rim lnga'i khrid yig zab don snying po
rig 'dzin yongs 'dus las/_tshe sgrub ye shes 'od mchog gi gsang sgrub phrin las kyi byang bu ye shes 'od kyi thig le
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa (pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā)
dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi gtor ma'i cho ga rin po che asma garbha ([śrīḍākārṇavatantrabalividhi-ratnāśmagarbha])
sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba (chandoratnākara-nāma)
nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-pañcapāramitānirdeśa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
phrin sgrub rin po che'i sgron me
rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel (vajrapadagarbhasaṃgraha-nāma-pañjikā)
dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs (sarasvatīsādhana)
kun bzang dgongs pa kun 'dus las/_smin byed kun gyi snying po nor bu'i sgron me bltas chog tu bkod pa
nor lha spyi'i sgab 'dre mnan pa'i man ngag
gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs (yamāntakasādhana)
phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs (sahasrabhujanetrasādhana)
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba (śrīvajrabhairavamaṇḍalavidhiprakāśa-nāma)
chu sbyin gyi cho ga ([tarpaṇavidhi])
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (āryamañjuśrī-nāmasaṃgītimaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa (triratnastotra)
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_rig 'dzin rak+sha thod phreng gi srung zlog las rim khyer bder bkod pa bdud 'joms rdo rje'i go mtshon
'jam dpal gshin rje'i thugs tig las/_/sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor snying po
mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po/
byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi chos kyi gaṇḍi (boddhisattvajātakadharmagaṇḍī)
srid pa rgyud lung gi rgyud phyi ma kha 'bar nag po las rgya mtsho'i rgyud
rdo rje phur pa thugs kyi nying khu'i phrin las lam khyer mdor dril ba rnal 'byor dga' ston
mdo dbang khams lugs su grags pa sbrang rtsi'i chu rgyun pod gnyis pa la/
mgon po tshogs bdag gi sngags 'grigs bai ro tsa nas ldi ri chos grags la gnang ba/
klong gsal rdo rje snying po'i rdzogs chen gyi khrid rim mdor bsdus pa 'ja' zer grong 'jug
snying rje khros pa'i sgrub thabs (hālāhalasādhana)

slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa'i rgyud sde bzhi'i yang snying:_bde gshegs zhi khro'i snying khrag gcig tu bsdus pa mtshon srung rdo rje'i go khrab kun thub srung ba'i rgyal po'i bri rgyun zab pa'i mthar thug
rdo rje sems dpa' rtsa ba gsum gyi las byang don gyi gsal 'debs la 'jug pa
'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs (ārya-tathāgatapratibimbapratiṣṭhānuśaṃsāsaṃvadanti-nāma-dharmaparyāya)
bla ma mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub pa mkha' 'gro'i srog 'dren/
lha mo sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud (devījālimahāmāyā-tantra-nāma)
dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud
bi ma snying thig spros bcos dkyil 'khor bri tshul/
yang gsang thugs kyi phur gcig gi sman mchod
dpal legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po mchod ba'i cho ga bdud las rnam rgyal/
gsang bdag dregs pa kun 'dul gyi bsnyen yig rin chen bai DUr+ya sngon po'i phreng ba
bla ma drag po mthing nag yang khros kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga gnam lcags dbal zer
dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i mdo (śrāmaṇeraśikṣāpadasūtra)
mkhan chen la bstod pa 'jam dpal ma/
zab bdun mchog zab yang dag las/_sgrub chen lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dang 'brel ba'i dbang bskur rgyas pa bla ma he ru ka dpal gyi zhal lung bde chen mchog gi myur lam
dpal mgon po'i nag po'i gtor ma zhes bya ba (śrīmahākālabali-nāma)
so sor 'brang ma'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo badri ba'i thabs ([pratisarārakṣācakralekhopāya])
rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems mdud pa 'grol ba'i man ngag (yogisvacittagranthamocakopadeśa)
snyan brgyud bla ma yang gsang pad+ma 'od 'bar gyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs yid bzhin tog gi phreng ba
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītimaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
rdzogs chen sde gsum gyi byang bu khrigs sdeb la sbyar rgyu'i sman mchod
'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-dīpaṃkaravyākaraṇa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rin po che bdud rtsi bcud thigs kyi rgyud
spros med dbang gi bum thig dang dag pa sbyar ba/
'dus pa mdo'i sku bzhi'i gleng 'grel rgyud don gsal byed/
'dus pa chen po'i mdo (mahāsamaya-sūtra)
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_rdo rje gtsug tor gyi byad 'grol srung ba bcas khyer bder phyungs pa gdengs chog ral gri
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po rang byung ye shes kyi rgyud
grub pa'i dbang phyug dzA ha bI ra yi gdams pa thun mong ma yin pa
thugs dam zab pa skor bdun las:_bka' srung dregs pa'i mchod bstod
karma ma hA g+hu ru'i sgrub skor las rtsa ba'i sgrub pa gter byon
gsang thig skor bdun gyi bka' srung ma mo sngags kyi srung ma'i rjes gnang gi mtshams sbyor rdo rje'i phreng ba
gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrugb thabs kyi rgyud (mahāyakṣāparājitasādhanatantra)
drang srong lok+t+ri zhi drag gi bsnyen yig mdor bsdus gnad don rab gsal
rdo rje phur pa yang gsang bla med kyi gsang sgrub rgyun gyi phrin las rnam rol snying po
gtum po dregs pa kun 'dul las/_khyung sgrub gdug pa kun 'joms kyi dbang bskur gdon 'dul glog gi me lce
sems sde'i rig 'dzin nyer brgyad rtsa 'dab la sgom tshul gyi dpe ris
ye shes rin chen 'od kyi rgyud
thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa las bdud rtsi sman dbang rgyas pa dngos grub bdud rtsi'i gter chen logs su bkol ba
rdo rje byab pa'i las tshogs ([vajrapavitrakarma-saṃbhāra])
tshig bdun sgrub thabs zab mo las:_mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i dbang bskur
me lha zhi bar gyur ba 'bar ba'i rgyud

'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-mahāmaṇivipulavimānaviśvasupratiṣṭhitaguhyaparama-rahasyakalparāja-nāma-dhāraṇī)
rkyen gsum bshad pa (tripratyayabhāṣya)
so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs ([pratisarāsādhana])
gsang thig snying po'i skor las:_ma mo sngags kyi srung ma'i las rim
dpal rta mgrin gsang ba phrin las kyi rgyud
rdo rje tsar tsi ka'i las sgrub pa'i thabs (vajracarcikākarmasādhana)
dri med bshags rgyud nas khol phyung phyag gi bkol byang rgyas bsdus gnyis ka
rten gsum rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga dge legs 'dod 'jo
de kho na nyid la 'jugs pa zhes bya ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' ma lus pa mdor bsdus te bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa (tattvāvatārākhyasakalasugatavacastātparyavyākhyāprakaraṇa)
rin po che brdar ba'i gzungs
rdzogs chen sde gsum gyi zhi rgyas sbyin sreg shin tu bsdus pa'i ngag 'don dge:
'chi ba slu ba'i sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs (mṛtyuvañcanasitatārāsādhana)
dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa zhes bya ba (sarvamaṇḍalānusāreṇa pañcavidhi-nāma)
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i sa bcad don gsal me long /
'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags (ārya-cakṣurviśodhanī-nāma-vidyāmantra)
'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-buddhahṛdaya-nāma-dhāraṇī)
a ti spyi gcod kyi rgyud
byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus
gnas kyi lung phran bcu drug ces bya ba rnams legs par/
gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs (yamāntakasādhana)
bdud gza' kha 'bar ral gcig gi bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi gyer sgom gnam lcags spu gri
rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bsgom pa'i don bsdus pa (vajradhātumaṇḍalārthabhāvanāpiṇḍārtha)
yang zab thugs rje chen po rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i phrin las khol phyung bklag chog tu bkod pa phan bde'i snying po
dbu ma'i man ngag rin po che'i śa ma tog kha phye ba zhes bya ba (ratnakaraṇḍodghāṭa-nāma-madhyamakopadeśa)
rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil chog gang la'ang sbyar chog pa yan lag brgyad pa'i 'bru 'grel nyung ngur bsdus pa/
rdzogs pa chen po bka' 'dus las:_rtsa sgrub snying po don 'dus kyi:_sgrub pa snying po yongs rdzogs
'pho ba snyan brgyud ma'i zin bris
rdzogs pa chen po yang ti sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rig pa'i rtsal dbang dang /_spyi ti dang thun mong ba'i rig pa'i rtsal dbang rgyas par bskur ba'i yi ge ye shes sgo 'byed
rgyal bstan yun du gnas phyir 'phags pa'i gnas brtan bcu drug gi cho ga thub bstan nyin byed
'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po'i yang zlog gi man ngag rdo rje pha lam
mchod rten gyi dbye ba 'dul ba byung ba'i mdo ([caityavibhāgavinayodhavasūtra])
rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa (ucchuṣmajambhalopadeśastotra)
phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa las tshogs stong rgyas zhes bya ba ([trisamṛddhakarmasiddhyupakrama karmasaṃbhārasahasrapauṣṭika-nāma])
dgongs gter sgrol ma'i zab tig las/_legs so gsum gyi don khrid gsal bar bkod pa grub gnyis thig le
rdzogs pa chen po rgyud bcu bdun gyi dbang chog rdzogs pa rang byung gi rgyud kyi dgongs don ji bzhin chog bsgrigs zin bris su bkod pa
gnam chos thugs gter gyi skor las:_grub chen Dom+bi pa'i sgrub thabs
thugs rje chen po rgyal po lugs 'gro 'dul gyi brgyud 'debs
gzhon nu'i gdon bzhi las thar par byed pa'i man ngag ([catuṣkumāragrahanirmocakopadeśa])
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_phyi gsol 'debs kyi tshul du sgrub pa dang rjes su 'brel bar tshogs gnyis spel ba'i cho ga byin rlabs char 'bebs
phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa bye brag tu bshad pa (pañcaskandhaprakaraṇavaibhāṣā)
dkyil 'khor gyi chos don mdor bsdus pa/
gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa (advayanāḍikābhāvanākrama)
'dul ba mdo'i 'grel pa mngon par brjod pa rang gi rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba (vinayasūtravṛttyabhidhānasvavyākhyāna-nāma)
rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso/
thugs rje chen po ngan song kun skyob kyi las byang ston mtshan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
man ngag gser gyi thur ma can
rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs (vajravārāhīsādhana)
rdo rje nyi mkhrag 'thung ba'i rgyud
sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs (mahāmāyāsādhana)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs (amṛtakuṇḍalīsādhana)
do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag (dohakoṣa-nāma-mahāmudropadeśa)
'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo (ārya-śilākṣipta-sūtra)
seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (khadiravaṇītārāsādhana)
nye brgyud tshe khrid 'chi med rdo rje'i srog shing khrigs su bsdebs pa
'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-aṣṭamaṇḍalaka-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)

thugs rje chen po'i yang snying gu ru chos dbang gi thugs bcud thugs chen 'khor ba dong sprug gi lam dus kyi dbang chog rgyun khyer o rgyan bla ma'i zhal lung bdud rtsi'i char 'beb 'jam dbyangs chos rjes mdzad pa
phrin las yongs rdzogs thugs rje'i sgron ma:_o rgyan bka' nan rab brjid don grub
rdo rje lha mo bcu drug gi mchod phreng mdor bsdus pa rdo rje sgra ma'i mchod sprin
dpal nam mkha' med p'ai rgyud rin po che sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud
chos bdag bar chad sel ba'i chos bka' las:_'jam dpal nag po'i yang zlog bsam gtan nyal chog
lta ba ngan pa sel ba zhes bya ba (kudṛṣṭinirghāta-nāma)
dpal phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi man ngag lag tu blang ba'i sgrub thabs ([śrīvajrapāṇisūtranītyupadeśaprakriyāsādhana])
grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba (muktitilaka-nāma)
thugs rje chen po mi tra snying thig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten dbang phyug yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs
mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i man ngag shes rab 'khor lo'i dngos grub mchog thob pa'i sgrub thabs (nāmasaṃgītyāmnāyena siddhaprajñacakravaralabdhasādhana)
dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba (śrīmañjuvajrodayamaṇḍalopāyikā-sarvasattvahitāvahā-nāma)
khwa gdong ma srang mda' nag mo zhes bye ba ([kākāsyatulākoṭīkālī-nāma])
ye shes rab 'bar las:_gos sngon can gyi za yig
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-aṣṭādaśasāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rdzogs pa chen po sgyu ma ngal gso'i don khrid yid bzhin nor bu/
tshe bdag yang zlog me'i spu gri'i rnon po nang gcod kyi sgrub thabs dbang bka' bcas
byin dbang dngos grub char 'bebs/
rdo rje gtsug lag gi rgyud kyi las byang ngag bsgrigs su khol bur byas pa nye bar mkho ba
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs (śrīvajrabhairavasādhanopāyikā)
phyag rgya bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba (mudrācaturaṭīkā-ratnahṛdaya-nāma)
rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba (pañcakramapañjikārthaprabhāsa-nāma)
tshogs chen 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs/
gdams ngag gi khyad par (āmnāyāntara)
bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba (mahāsukhāmṛitaprabhā-nāma)
dzambha la tshon po'i sgrub thabs (ucchuṣmajambhalasādhana)
'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-lohatuṇḍa-nāma-dhāraṇī)
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_sde brgyad khengs mdos khol phyung bltas chog tu bkod pa rtsub 'gyur rnyog ma gting dwangs
rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po (vajrabhūmitricaraṇi-rājakalpa-nāma)
nyams chag sdig sgrib thams cad bshags pa'i rgyal po na rag dong sprugs
dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra'i 'grel pa dag ldan gsal ba'i me long /
thugs rje chen po pad ma rgyas pa'i rgyud
bzlas dmigs/
dpal pad ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog yon tan gyi rgyud
rigs lnga'i khyung sgrub gdug pa kun 'dul gyi dbang chog dug lnga'i stobs 'joms
dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs (śrīvajrayoginīsādhana)
phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag rnal 'byor gyi spyod lam brgyad pa zhes bya ba ([vajrapāṇyanalajihvapuraḥsarakalpa-yogacaryāmārgāṣṭaka-nāma])
sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs (sitatārāsādhana)
rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs (hayagrīvasādhana)
dam tshig gi klong /
sku gsum rigs 'dus dpe'u ris
rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (svādhiṣṭhānakramopadeśa-nāma)
rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems rin po che spungs pa gsang ba man ngag gyi rgyud
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa (pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā)
'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po chen po sgeg pa'i sgrub thabs (mañjughoṣamahārājalīlāsādhana)
rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag ([vajragītāvavāda])
de kho na nyid rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba (tattvaratnāvalī-nāma)
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par bshad pa ([bodhisattvacaryāvatāravivṛtti])
dpal bka' 'dus chos kyi rgya mtsho'i brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bsdus pa
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_bla ma longs sku 'gro 'dul ngan song dong sprug gi phrin las dbang bskur gnas lung dang bcas pa gzhan phan shing rta
rdzogs pa chen po a ti zab don snying po'i khrid dmigs zin bris su spel ba kun bzang dgongs rgyan
mdo sde'i don kun las btus pa'i man ngag (sūtrārthasamuccayopadeśa)
zla ba'i mdo (candra-sūtra)
bdud rtsi 'o ma'i mchod pa zhes bya ba (dugdhāmṛtapūjā-nāma)
sku gsum gyi snang ba gsal bar ngo sprod pa'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_rtsa ba mngon rdzogs rgyal po dang:_yan lag dgu bsgril dbang rnams
mi g-yo ba'i mngon par rtogs pa rab tu dga' bar mngon par brjod pa (acalābhisamayasuratābhidhāna)

rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las/_gsang skor yi dam khro bo'i dbang bskur bltas chog tu bkod pa ye shes klong yangs

zab pa skor bdun las:_phrin las mjug gi spyi chings

'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo rin chen gsang ba'i rgyud

'dul ba lung bla ma'i bye brag lung zhu ba'i 'grel pa (vinayottarāgamaviśeṣāgamapraśnavṛtti)
bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin po che gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba (bhagavacchrīcakraśambarasyasādhanaratnacūḍamaṇī-nāma)

brda sprod dbyangs can (sārasvatavyākaraṇa)

chos rgyal srong btsan sgam po'i bka' 'bum zhal gdams las byung ba'i smin byed dbang gi lag len bcud 'dus bdud rtsi'i rgyal po
bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlabs dang phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (rakṣācakrādhiṣṭhānapṛṣṭhyopadeśa-nāma)
rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba (kulalokanātha-apicadaśaka-nāma)

od gsal rdzogs pa chen po man ngag sde'i gnad kyi bcud phud sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum/
jo bo puN+ye shrIs mdzad pa'i dge bsnyen sdom pa'i rnam par bzhag pa tshigs bcad brgyad pa ma/

rang gi sems ngal (ga) so ba'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba (svacittaviśrāmopadeśapañcaviṃśatikāgāthā-nāma)

'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-akāśagarbha-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)

rdzogs chen ma rgyud mkha' 'gro gsang ba lam khyer las:_gsang dbang gi lag len

'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par 'grel pa (āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāprajñāpāramitopadeśaśāstrābhisamayālaṃkārakārikāvārttikā)
rdo rje phur bu yang gsang spu gri'i las byang kun bzang rol mtsho
'phags pa ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig
dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po theg pa chen po'i mdo (saddharmarāja-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bde gshegs rtsa gsum tshe yi phrin las snying po gsal byed
rdo rje phur pa'i mo pra sgrub pa'i zin bris gsal ba'i me long
'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag b+dun pa'i tshogs bsags pa'i thabs ([mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītisptāṅgasambhāropāya])
rdzogs chen snying po hU~M skor las:_zhi byed rin chen phra bkod
'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs (āryatārānucarīyakṣiṇīsādhana)
mgon po bing gi sgrub thabs dbang chog dang dbang bcas pa/
bayng chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud

gnam chos las thub pa gnas bcu'i dbang sgrub bsdus pa dang dbang bshad
stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs (mahāsahasrapramardanīsādhana)

'phags pa rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng gzhi dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i le'u rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba
sbyor ba'i phreng ba (yogamālā)
de bzhin gshegs pa khyed sku sogs shis smon/
('phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ) ([ārya-advayasamatāvijayākhyāvikalpa-mahārāja])
'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo (ārya-ojapratyaṅgiranisūtra)
yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (pretamukha-agnijvālayaśarakāra-nāma-dhāraṇī)
sgrol ma'irtog pa las byung ba'i tshig lhug pa'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs (muktakena tār[ākalp]odbhavakurukullāsādhana)

dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (śrī-kālacakrasādhana-nāma)

'phags ma 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba'i rtog pa'i snying po bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba (āryā-mārīcīmaṇḍalavidhimārīcījāta-dvādaśasahasra-uddhitaṃ kalpahṛdayasaptaśata-nāma)
nyang gter rgyal mdos dkar po drug mdos kyi 'don zin

dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la blta ba ([trikālabuddhadṛṣṭi])
sprin gyi pho nya zhes bya ba (meghadūta-nāma)
'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po chen po'i bshad sbyar (āryabhadracaryamahāpraṇidhānarājanibandhana)
ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rmad du byung ba bcu gnyis kyi tshul dad pa'i 'od stong 'dren pa'i skya rengs/
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha snyan rgyud zab mo'i skor las:_thub pa gnas brtan 'khor bcas kyi sgrub thabs snang
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las/_mkha' 'gro'i rgyab chos byin rlabs dbang gi lag len smin byed bdud rtsi'i thigs pa bltas chog tu bkod pa
dzam+b+ha la dmar po grwa ston chen po'i gter ma'i lugs kyi sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa
yang zab dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bklag chog tu bkod pa phrin las 'od zer
'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (āryamāyājālakrameṇa bhaṭṭārikātārāsādhana)
a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga (arapacanasādhanavidhi)
tsandra pa'i uṇa la sogs pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba (candrasyoṇādivṛtti-nāma)
byang chub kyi sems sgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
klu gtor rgyas pa ([nāgavistarabali])
rin chen gter mdzod chen po'i smin grol 'bogs pa'i skabs kyi phyag len nyer mkho'i zur 'debs mtshams sbyor rigs bcas nyung gsal du bkod pa 'dod rgu 'jo ba'i gter bum
'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-suvarṇa-sūtra-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
(chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i) phyi ma'i phyi ma
nyes pa kun sel
dam chos sprul sku'i snying tig las:_sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo tshe 'phel ma'i nang sgrub zab mo
khro bo rnam par rgyal ba gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud
phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (nīlambaradharavajrapāṇiroṣaṇa-nāma-sādhana)
zab pa skor bdun las:_gter srung dregs pa sde lnga'i gtor chog
zab chos rig 'dzin thugs thig gi ka dag gi khrid yig dri med snang ba
phyi dbang gi chu bo las yo ga'i dbang gi them skas ldeb/
rdo rje bzlas pa'i rgya cher bshad pa (vajrajapaṭīkā)
mon bu pu tra ming sring gi sgrub thabs man ngag dang bcas pa slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga (śrīguhyasamājamaṇḍalopāyikā)
khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi bla ma smra ba'i seng ge 'jam dpal pha rol rgol 'joms kyi cha lag 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga 'chi bdag gdong zlog
thang lha'i skong gsol rig 'dzin rgod ldem gyis mdzad pa
sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa (trisaṃvarakrama)
bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa ([devarājasuyāmabhagavanmaṅgalagāthā])
mgon po g.yul zlog gi zin ris sgron me skor gsum las/_mdos chog gi zur 'debs dang lag len gyi chings snang byed sgron me
thugs rje chen po yi ge drug pa'i gsol 'debs sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i rig gtad cho ga mchog dman snying gi bdud rtsi
gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma/
ltas ngan zlog pa'i man ngag phyag len ma
dregs 'dul drag po gnam lcags 'khor lo las:_gtum po nA ga rak+sha'i gsang sgrub rdo rje me 'bar
'phags pa gshin rje (gshed) dmar po'i sgrub thabs (āryaraktayamārisādhana)
gdung mchod lhan thabs rigs
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa (śrīvajrabhairavastuti)
snyan rgyud rdo rje'i tshig rkang zhes bya ba (karṇatantravajragāthā-nāma)
klu kun tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar (nāgānanda-nāma-nāṭaka)
ku n'a la'i rtogs pa brjod pa (kuṇālāvadāna)

rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba (śrī-vajramāla-abhidhānamahāyogatantra-sarvatantrahṛdaya-rahasyavibhaṅga-iti)
ye shes mkha' 'gro bdud 'dul drag mo seng ge'i gdong can gyi bsnyen yig mchog thun dngos grub kyi gter bum
rten 'brel bsdus pa'i sgron ma dang /_(lce btsun gyi mgur/)
dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po/
ye shes nam mkha'i rgyal po'i don 'grel/
gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga ([vimaloṣṇīṣadhāraṇīvidhi])
grags pa bskyed pa'i cho ga ([kīryautpādanavidhi])
thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa'i gsol 'debs yid bzhin nor bu
kun bzang thugs gter las/_yang dag zhi khro phur gsum gyi phrin las byang bu grub gnyis nor bu'i rgya mtsho
bka' rdzogs pa chen po yang zab dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi las byang don gsal khyer bder bsgrigs pa phrin las kun khyab
'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed khro chu dug sdong nag po'i las byang gdug pa kun sgrol
ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u (samādhisambhāraparivarta)
gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba (raktayamāntakaniṣpannayoga-nāma)
dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa ga las 'jigs med (mūlamadhyamakrvṛttiakutobhayā)
thugs rje chen po rtsa gsum snying thig las/_tshe sgrub yid bzhin lhun grub kyi nyams len dang dbang chog tshe dpal lhun grub
dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dbang bskur yongs rdzogs dkyus gcig tu bkod pa dri med zla ba'i bsil zer
padma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud (padmamukuṭa-tantra-nāma)
ye shes rab 'bar las/_kun 'dus srung zlog rdzas sgrub nag po
'jam dpal gshin rje'i ma ru tse'i sngags rgyud
rtsa gsum dgongs 'dus zab mo gter gyi mdzod las/_rig 'dzin don gyi dbang bskur
'phags pa sa bcu'i rnam par bshad pa (āryadaśabhūmivyākhyāna)
rdo rje'i chos srung rnams kyi gtor 'bul rig 'dzin d+harma swA mIs mdzad pa
gu ru'i thugs sgrub bder gshegs 'dus pa dang pad+ma gsang ba'i thig le gang la'ang sbyar du rung ba'i/_zhi khro'i skong bshags kyi cho ga kun bzang khrus chab
gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs (kṛṣṇayamārisādhana)
rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal khye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyar shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba (śrīhevajratantrarājaṭīkā-suviśadasaṃputa-nāma)
rdo rje ka p'a la bhan dha gsang ba 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang
klong gsal rdo rje snying po las:_khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs
las grub pa'i gzungs
sdeb sbyor gyi phreng ba'i bstod pa (vṛttamālāstuti)
de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa/
sgrol ma dkar mo phyag drug ma'i sgrub thabs (ṣaḍbhujaśuklatārāsādhana)
shu lo ka brgya lobs pa
rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams kyi rnam par bzhag pa zhes bya ba (vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalasarvadevavyavasthāna-nāma)
gza' dgu'i mchod pa'i cho ga ([navagrahārcanavidhi])
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag (śrīcakrasaṃvaratattvopadeśa)
mi tra snying thig 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma sku gsum brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
'phags ma seng ldeng gnas kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (āryakhadiravaṇītārāsādhana)
rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i man ngag me long dwangs pa zhes bya ba ([ādarśaprasāda-nāma-tārābhaṭṭārikopadeśa])
dpal rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa dregs pa kun sgrol gyi drag sngags bsnyen lugs gsum gyi gdams pa
gsang chen snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i gsung rab zab mo nye brgyud kyi chos sde rin chen gter mdzod chen po'i bzhugs byang dkar chag gsal bar bkod pa 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i gru gzings
sbyin bskrad 'dzud byang
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_bka' srung dregs pa pho mo'i sgrub thabs
don yod zhags pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga ([amoghapāśabalividhi])
gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs (grahamātṛkā-nāma-dhāraṇī)
thal ba nag po'i rgyud
bkra shis don kun grub pa'i dbyangs snyan
rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa (ratnavṛkṣa-nāma-rahasyasamājavṛtti)
thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa las/_dbang gi rdzong chen yan lag dang bcas ma bu gung bsdebs kyi yi ge rnam grol byin rlabs rol pa
thugs kyi thigs pa'i 'grel bshad rin chen sgron ma/
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bshad pa zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba (śrīguhyasamājatantrarājaṭīkā-candraprabhā-nāma)
thugs sgrub yang tig gces sgron khrid kyi zin bris gzhung don rab gsal
maṇḍal gyi cho ga (maṇḍalavidhi)
gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs (kṛṣṇayamārisādhana)
rtsa gsum rig 'dzin srog sgrub las/_byin 'beb me tog char sil ngo mtshar lha'i snang ba
rang bzhin lnga ma (pañcasvabhāva)
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'od zer brgya pa/
chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsngo ba chung ba ([dharmadānalaghupariṇamanā])
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-avalokiteśvaramātā-nāma-dhāraṇī)
bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po
dpal tshe bdag phyag rgya zil gnon gyi bsnyen yig srid gsum dgra las rnam par rgyal ba
rtsa rlung gi rtsa ba
'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-viśeṣavati-nāma-dhāraṇī)
rdo rje snying po las/_rje btsun byams pa mgon po'i cho ga dbang bskur dang bcas pa lung rtogs bcud spel
rje btsun dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa (śrībhaṭṭārakamahākālastotra)
mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa (śrīcakrasaṃvaramaṇḍalamaṅgalagāthā)
rgyan dam pa sna tshogs rim par phye ba bkod pa (paramālaṃkāraviśvapaṭalavyūha)
shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba (suniṣprapañcatattvopadeśa-nāma)
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud
dpal ldan mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po drag sngags gsang ba spu gri'i byed chu 'babs su bkod pa mthu stobs rab 'byed/
rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (vajraḍākinīyoginīsādhana-nāma)
bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa (gurukriyākrama)
ral gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs (śuklaikajaṭīsādhana)
nag po cen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po (mahākāla-tantrarāja-nāma)
chos rgyal rin chen gling pa'i rdzogs chen a ti chig chod kun grol gyi chos sde
rdzogs pa chen po yang gsang spyi ti'i dbang gi lag len smin grol bcud kyi zhun thigs
rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa (yoginīsañcārya)
rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa (vajramahākālāṣṭakastotra)
rigs pa'i thigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa (nyāyabinduṭīkā)
mnga' ris rig 'dzin chen po'i zab gter drag po dbu dgu'i gter srung ma ning sde brgyad dang brtan ma'i mchod phrin
sman mchod
phyugs nad gor bsrung ba'i cho ga ([paśumārīrakṣāvidhi])
tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba (gaṇacakravidhi-nāma)
dpa' bo gcig pa dpal he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (ekavīraśrīherukaṣoḍaśabhujasādhana-nāma)
rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa (vādanyāyaṭīkā)
'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/
thugs rje chen po pad+ma sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/_ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa'i bka' gtad byin rlabs lcags kyu
las rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba (karmavibhaṅga-nāma)
'jam dpal las kyi gshin rje khro chu dug gdong gi gtor dbang bklag chog tu bkod pa ha la'i bcud len
'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs (ārya-yaśovatī-dhāraṇī)
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa (śrīcakrasaṃvaratattvagarbhasaṃgraha)
thugs rje chen po lta ba yang thog gi ryud
dam tshig rgyan gyi rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba (samayālaṃkāraṭīkā-nāma)
sprul pa'i rgyal chen sku lnga'i gsol phrin dbang gi gad rgyangs
yang gsang tshe yi sgrub pa 'chi med rdo rje'i srog grub/
thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i gnas lung bsdus pa'i skabs rigs drug gnas 'dren mdor bsdus su bya ba'i tshul
rim pa gsum bsdus pa'i man ngag
'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-buddhākṣepaṇa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs sngags
sras mchog badzra kI la ya'i sgos sgrub ha la nag po gnod byed phog 'gyel
nye bar bsgyur ba nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba (viṃśatyupasargavṛtti-nāma)
lhan cig skyes grub kyi gzhung 'grel zhes bya ba (sahajasiddhipaddhati-nāma)
dam chos sprul sku snying thig lasaH_g+hu ru rdo rje khro lod kyi las byang nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rig 'dzin bdud 'dul rdo rje'i snying thig zab mo
dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg mdor bsdus pa ([śrīvajrapāṇihomasaṃkṣepa])
'phags pa don rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs (ārya-arthavighuṣṭa-nāma-dharmaparyāya)
so thar mdo yi mchan 'grel nyung ngu nges legs them skas/
rje btsun khros ma'i sgrub mchod cha lag dang bcas pa mkha' spyod pad+ma 'od du bgrod byed mchog gi myur lam
rdzas rtags brgyad dang sna bdun 'bul ba
gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maṇḍal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (kṛṣṇayamārisādhanamaṇḍalavidhi-nāma)
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa khro nag lha bco lnga pa'i sgrub thabs gzungs kyi cho ga dang bcas pa sbyong byed rdo rje'i bum pa/
byings kyi tshogs (dhātukāya)
kun bzang thugs gter las yang dag gi cha lag tshe sgrub gsang ba yang khol gyi sgrub thabs dbang bskur dang bcas pa 'chi med bcud ldan
rdo rje phur pa yang gsang spu gri 'bar ba'i las byang khyer bde snying por dril ba kun bzang bde lam
rtog pa las brgyud pa'i 'od zer can ma'i sgrub thabs (kalpāmnāyamārīcīsādhana)
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa (śatasāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā)
bstan pa skyong ba'i dam can chen po rnams kyi phrin las dngos grub kyi rol mtsho
tshe sgrub ye shes srog tig gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dngos grub sgo 'byed
rdor gling gter byon snyan brgyud gu ru drag po'i las byang khyer bder bsdus pa zab don snang ba'i nyin byed
seng ge dang bya khyung dang khyab 'jug la bzhugs pa'i sgrub thabs (harihariharivāhanasādhana)
bslab pa lnga'i phan yon gyi mdo (pañcaśikṣyānuśaṃsā-sūtra)
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (vajrayoginīsādhana-nāma)
sdig pa me yi mtha' gtad/
ma h'a su kha ta'i glu ([mahāsukhatāgītikā])
dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
rgyal chen nang sgrub mdung dmar can rtsa sgrub rta sngon ma'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa
yang zab thugs rje chen po rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i phyi sgrub kyi rgyun khyer rin chen snying po
bram ze phur bu'i lugs kyi dbyangs can ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang las tshogs dang bcas pa'i skor rnams
theg pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba (mahāyānasthitiniścaya-nāma)
(rdo rje) mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba (vajraḍākinīgīti-nāma)
'khor lo rdo rje

dam can zhing skyong gnyis kyi sgrub pa'i sgab 'dre mnan pa'i man ngag

pad+ma khrag 'thung 'dus pa las/_snying po'i gtor dbang skur ba'i tshul ye shes snying po

'dul ba gzhi (vinayavastu)
de kho na nyid gsang ba'i rgyud
rdo rje drag po rtsal gyi nyams len rgyun khyer dngos grub kyi rdzing bu
lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud
dpe dgus skyon dgu ngos bzung bcos thabs bstan pa/
gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig gi rim pa mdor bsdus pa/_chos rje gtsang ston pas mdzad pa/
sbyin sreg gi cho ga ([homa-vidhi])
ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs (vāgīśvarasādhana)
kun mkhyen dri med 'od zer gyi rnam thar mthong ba don ldan/
rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi smes rin chen bkod pa rnam par dbye ba'i rgyud
thams cad bud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin
sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs (sitatārāsādhana)
rdo rje phag mo'i zab khrid las:_them yig gsal ba'i sgron me
rdzogs pa chen po mu tig phreng rgyud gsal byed paN chen bi ma las mdzad pa/
maṇḍal gyi sbyor ka ([maṇḍalagaṇa])
'od dpag med kyi snying po'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa gsungs pa ([amitābhagarbhatantre bhagavatyāryatārāyāḥ kalpoddeśa])
spyi 'gro bka' ma'i mchod pa bcu bzhi
klu dang sa bdag thams cad kyi gnyen po
rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba (śrī-caturpīṭhamahāyoginī-tantrarāja-nāma)
bum pa bzang po can gyi sgrub thabs ([bhadrakumbhisādhana])
spyi gsang sngags lung gi 'grel pa gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras mdzad pa/
uṇa la sogs pa (uṇādi)
khros ma nag mo'i rgyun khyer yid bzhin char 'beb
gri 'grol gsang ba'i man ngag
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur pa rgyud lugs kyi smad las dam can nye bar bsnyen pa'i man ngag ma mo mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung /
ma mo sngags kyi srung ma'i phrin las dngos grub 'byung gnas
sdom gsum 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba (trisaṃvaraprabhāmālā-nāma)
phur pa'i gtor 'bul bar chad kun sel/
do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba (dohakoṣapañjikā-nāma)
pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i sgrub thabs kyi phrin las dbang chen dgyes pa'i gad rgyangs
bla ma lnga bcu pa (gurupañcāśikā)
ka l'a pa'i uṇa la sogs pa'i mdo (kalāpoṇādisūtra)
'jam dpal chos dbyings gsung dbang gi dkyil cho ga ([dharmadhātuvāgīśvaramañjuśrīmaṇḍalavidhi])
dpal yang dag gi sgrub thabs bde chen thig le/
rdo rje theg pa'i sngags kyi gso sbyong dang 'brel ba'i sgrub chen bya tshul 'don zin reg zig mthong bas khong chud
'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa (ārya-buddhānusmṛti)
gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (kṛṣṇayamārimukhaṣaṭcakrasādhana-nāma)
'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs (mañjuśrīsādhana)
dam chos sprul sku snying thig las:_'phags pa thugs rje chen po nam mkha' rgyal po'i phrin las rang gzhung 'gro don lhun grub nor bu pad+ma'i phreng ba
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud (sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittakṛṣṇayamāri-nāma-tantra)
khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa (viśeṣastava-nāma-ṭīkā)
bla ma nor bu rgya mtsho las:_rtsa ba gsum gyi las byang nor bu pad+ma'i ljon shing
sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya ba (traisattvasamādhisamāhita-nāma)
gnod sbyin chen po ye shes gter gyi rgyud
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa (samyaksaṃbuddhaketastotra)
rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
rje sras 'bangs gsum la gdams pa'i phyag na rdo rje stobs po che las gtum po khro bo'i rgyud
spu gri nag po'i rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud (vjarasattvamāyājālaguhyasarvādarśa-nāma-tantra)
rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga'i 'od zer can dkar mo'i sgrub thabs (kalpoktavidhinā-sitamārīcīsādhana)
yi dam dmar nag 'jigs gsum las:_yig med u pa d+he sha:_'jam dpal dkar po ye shes sems dpa'i phyi sgrub
rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje rnam par sageg ma zhes bya ba (vajravilāsinī-nāma-vajravārāhīsādhana)
thugs rje chen po pad+ma sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/_lha chen dbang phyug chen po'i bka' gtad dbang gi lcags kyu
yang zab rtsa gsum snying po'i skor las/_bla ma drag po pad+ma gtum po'i dbang chog dregs pa kun 'joms
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la bstod pa (vajrayoginīstotra)
'dus pa mdo'i dbang gi cho ga khrigs su byas pa dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs las glegs bam gsum pa/
skyes pa'i rabs kyi (rgyud kyi) rgya cher bshad pa (jātakamālaṭīkā)
sman bla'i sgom bzlas shin tu bsdus pa phan bde'i myur lam/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-avalokiteśvaraparipṛcchā-saptadharmaka-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
mchog gling zab bdun dregs pa sde lnga'i gtor 'bul lhan thabs
klong chen snying gi thig le lasaH_skong bshags rdo rje'i thol glu
snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i brgyud pa gsum gyi bla ma la gsol ba 'debs pa byin rlabs char 'bebs
gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs dang 'brel bar swats+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'i lag len dri med kun snang /
ma cig gi bka' srung zangs ri'i btsan rgod spun gnyis kyi gtor chog
ldem dgongs brgyad kyi lhan thabs/
'jam dpal nag po'i skor las:_gshor dkar nag khra gsum zhes bya ba'i zab rgya can
dag snang mkha' 'gro'i chos skor las/_tshe sgrub rdo rje'i rgya mdud
'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-aṣṭamaṇḍalaka)
'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-saptabuddhaka-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bsam gtan phyi ma'i rgyud don rnam par bshad pa rig sngags 'dzin pa'i yid kyi 'dod 'jo/
ram bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs (mahāmāyūrīsādhana)
tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa cen po'i mdo (ārya-kṣemavatīvyākaraṇa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)

mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba (ḍākinīsarvacittādvayācintyajñānavajravārāhi-adhibhāva-tantrarāja-nāma)
gsang thig snying po skor gsum gyi brgyud 'debs byin rlabs snying po
'phags ma gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs ([āryamahāmantrānudhāraṇīsādhana])
dgongs gter las 'od zer can ma'i dbang
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_gsang skor bla ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu
bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gyi dka' 'grel (gurvārādhanapañjikā)
rta mgrin nag po yang gsang thugs kyi sgrub pa'i lo rgyus zab mo
klong gsal rdo rje'i snying po las:_dbang chen tshe sgrub nyi zla'i gwa'u
rta phag yid bzhin nor bu'i phyi sgrub ltung bshags cho ga'i zin bris 'don 'grigs bltas chog tu bkod pa
ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i rgyan bdun rnam par dgrol ba ([jñānavajrasamuccayatantrodbhavasaptālaṃkāravimocana])
zab bdun rtsa gsum tshe yi zab pa las:_tshe 'gugs pad+ma'i zhags pa
rigs gsum snying tig gi theg dgu'i sgom rim gyi zin bris rgyud lung man ngag gi snying po rig pa 'dzin pa'i dga' ston
zur bza'i thugs dam skor drug las:_mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i skor rnams
dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cha ga (śrīcakraśambarahomavidhi)
mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po'i mngon rtogs drag sngags gsang ba spu gri'i rgyud
'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa (ārya-amoghapāśapañcadevastotra)
rigs pa drug cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba (yuktiṣaṣṭikākārikā-nāma)
thugs dam zab pa skor bdun las:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro gdugs dkar gyi sgrub thabs
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba (śrī-kālacakrasupratiṣṭhopāyikāvidhi(nāma))
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba (āryamañjuśrīmaṇḍalavidhi-guṇasaṃbhava-nāma)
rtsa gsum bskang ba
dgyes pa rdo rje'i lag tu blang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba (hevajrasya hastavyavagrāhakrama-nāma)
dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phrin las kyi kha skong las bzhi mchog lnga'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub gnyis 'od zer 'khyil ba
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs ([vajrayoginīsādhana])
rgyud kyi lo rgyus dang 'brel ba'i 'chad thabs/
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_rig 'dzin dzam gling rgyan gcig gi dbang gi cho ga in+d+ra nI la'i chun po
dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs (sarasvatīsādhana)
dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (śrīmahākālasādhana-nāma)
khro bo sme brtsegs kyi sgo nas gzhan gyi nyams grib sel bar byed pa'i cho ga legs par
rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi brjed byang yon tan gyis 'gengs pa zhes bya ba (guṇabharaṇī-nāma-ṣaḍaṅgayogaṭippaṇī)
bkra shis gter gyi bum pa bzang po'i rten 'brel gyi man ngag
rtsa gsum rig 'dzin srog sgrub kyi rtsa ba'i dbang bskur ma bu zung bsdebs bltas chog tu bkod pa 'chi med ye shes myu gu
dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud (śrī-vajracaṇḍacittaguhya-tantra)
dgyes pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba (hevajrasādhana-tattvoddyotakara-nāma)
yang gsang thugs kyi phur gcig gi skyabs sems
dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa brgyad pa'i bshad pa (upāsakasaṃvarāṣṭakavivaraṇa)
yang dag pa'i rgyud
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba (śrīcakrasaṃvaramaṇḍaladevagaṇastotra-nāma)
rdo rje h'uṃ mdzad kyi sgrub thabs (vajrahūṃkārasādhana)
zab bdun rtsa gsum tshe zab las:_dbang gi mkha' 'gro'i bka' srung
lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba (tāradevīnāma-aṣṭaśataka)
dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa (shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ) (śrīparamādiṭīkā)
skal ldan yar klungs sprul skus mdzad pa'i bla 'gugs 'chi med rig 'dzin
'phags ma 'od zer can gyi gzungs gdon pa'i man ngag (āryamārīcīdhāraṇīpāṭhopadeśa)
rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs (vajrasattvasādhana)
'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa (ārya-samādhi-yagra-uttama)
dpal chen yang dag gi rgyun gyi rnal 'byor ru lu gsang ba'i dgongs pa/
yang gsang bla na med pa las:_tshe sgrub rig 'dzin srog thig tsha ba dmar thag
tshig bdun sgrub thabs zab mo las:_mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i skong bshags
gu ru drag po yang gsang bla med me rlung 'khyil ba'i don dbang nor bu lugs su bskur ba'i tshul ye shes bcud kyi snying po
dbu ma rgyan gyi man ngag (madhyamālaṃkāropadeśa)
'phags pa blo gros mi śad pas bstan pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa (āryākṣayamatinirdeśaṭīkā)
'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-tathāgatajñānamudrāsamādhi-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho ga (hevajramaṇḍalakarmakramavidhi)
dpal gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i sgrub thabs rnam grol shing rta/
'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa (ārya-saddharmānusmṛtyupasthāna)
thugs rje chen po don gsal sgron me las:_bka' srung dam can rdo rje legs pa srog gi 'khor lo'i sgrub skor las phyi sgrub
de kho na nyid kyi snying po sgrub pa zhes bya ba (tattvagarbhasādhana-nāma)
rtsa gsum sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las:_'dod rgu'i sprin gyi ting 'dzin
dpal gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud kyi spyi don nyung ngu'i ngag gis rnam par 'byed pa rin chen mdzod kyi lde mig
rdzogs pa chen po sgyu ma ngal gso'i bsdus don man+dA ra ba'i phreng ba/
gtum po (khro bo) chen po'i sgrub thabs (caṇḍamahāroṣaṇasādhana)
dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa (saṃkṣiptasekaprakriyā)
'chi bdag yi dwags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs ([mṛtyupatipretarājasādhana])
rdzogs chen snying po hU~M skor las:_'od gsal shes bya bum 'jug
'phags pa sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-trayastriṃśatparivarta-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
gtum po chen po ma rungs pa rdo rje khyung dang bcas pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po'i don btus pa
'ja' tshon ma ning gi zhi ba'i las kyi bye brag mkha' 'gro'i sun zlog gi las 'grigs dang /_sangs gling dgongs 'dus phal par sun zlog mdor bsdus bya tshul gnyis gsal bar bkod pa phan bde kun khyab
phung po gsum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (triskandhasādhana-nāma)
gsang ba yang gter sku gsum gyi rgyud
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_gsang skor bla ma rig 'dzin yongs rdzogs dbang chog
mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa (caityasādhanavidhipiṇḍīkṛta)
mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i shes pa dug gsum las bzlog pa'i man ngag ([nāmasaṃgītijñānaviṣatrayanivāraṇopadeśa])
smin gling gter chen zab gter rdzogs chen a ti zab don snying po'i gter gzhung chos skor rig pa'i rtsal dbang ma gtogs yongs rdzogs ring sbrel
snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i man ngag gi khog chings/
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti-nāma-homakrama)
pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i byed pa'i sgrub thabs ([parasenāpradhvaṃsanasādhana])
sa nad gnyan nad 'joms pa'i phyir:_nad bdag stobs 'joms man ngag
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba (śrīvajrabhairavamaṇḍalavidhiprakāśa-nāma)
byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man ngag ([bodhicittabhāvanopadeśa])
rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan nyams kyi sgron me/__(rig 'dzin dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa yin)/
las tshogs rin chen khang bu las:_sad srung sprin gyi go cha'i gdams pa
zab bdun rtsa gsum tshe'i zab pa'i cha lag_/las kyi mkha' 'gro rdo rje sder mo'i dbang chog gsal bar bkod pa g.yu'i bum bzang
chos mngon pa la 'jug pa rgya cher 'jug pa snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba (sārasamuccaya-nāma-abhidharmāvatāraṭīkā)
dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa (āryajambhalastotra)
chu sgyur gyi man ngag zab pa 'ga' zhig
rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sgrub khog skabs yang yang nyer mkho'i bskrad 'beb zur byang
DA ki'i snyan brgyud zab mo las:_rjes su gnang ba mkha' 'gro srog gi tha rams
rin po che 'byung bar byed pa sgra thal 'gyur chen po'i rgyud
dam tshig las kyi rgyal po'i rgyud
yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa (guṇāparyantastotraṭīkā)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub pad+ma gsang ba'i thig le las/_rtsa ba'i dbang bskur rgyas pa'i cho ga bklag chog tu bsdebs pa ye shes chu rgyun
dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba (śrīvajrasattvānusmṛitividhi-nāma)
dpal sangs rgyas thams cad (dang) mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba (śrīsarvabuddha-samayoga-maṇḍala-sādhana-krama-nāma)
dge bsnyen dgra gsang nag po'i rgyud
spros med dbang gi ti ka/_lung med/
ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud
dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa (śrībhagavadekajaṭāstotra)
chu gtor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (jalabalividhi-nāma)
('jigs byed kyi bstod pa ) ([bhairavastuti])
gsang bdag yang gsang sgrub pa dang:_nyi ma mdung gang ma
byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa (bodhisattvasaṃvaraviṃśaka)
rdo rje khyung gtsug lag 'khor lo'i rgyud
thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i brgyud 'debs thugs rje mkha' khyab
sgrol ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs (mahātārāsādhana)
mkha' 'gro me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud
sems bskyed kyi cho ga
sgyu 'phrul drwa ba stong phrag brgya ba'i rgyud ba'i rgyud las bcud bsdus man ngag lam rim don 'byed/
gces pa bsdus pa'i 'phrin yig btsun pa chen po dpal dbyangs kyis bod rje 'bangs la rdzangs pa ([mahābhadantaśrīghoṣapreṣitabhoṭasvāmidāsasārasaṃgrahalekha])
'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs (āryaraktayamārisādhana)
'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa (lokātītastava)
sgrub bya gza'i byad du gzhug pa'i 'khor lo can ([sādhyagrahābhicārikacakrikā])
sems rin po che rnam par sbyang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i spring yig (cittaratnaviśodhanakrama-nāma-lekha)
rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i 'dre rgyud chen po
rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba (vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalopāyikāsarvavajrodaya-nāma)
chos kyi sdom bzhi ston pa dri ma med pa'i gtam kun mkhyen klong chen pas mdzad pa/
go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa'i ming (pratikarahṛidayaśatakanāma)
mnyam med rje btsun sgam po pa rin po che'i zhal gdams gsang lam bla ma sgrub pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs phrin las kyi byang bu bklag chog tu bkod pa nyi ma'i snying po ye shes rgyan gyi bla bre
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba (śrī-kālacakrahomopāyikāvidhi(nāma))
po ta la kar 'gro ba'i lam yig ([potalakagamanamārgapattrikā])
rta mgrin bde gshegs gcig dril gyi chos skor che ba
ma mo dpal ldan lha mo'i mchod gsol rat+na'i phreng ba/
rdzogs chen gyi lo rgyus dang bsdus don/
so sor thar pa'i mdo (prātimokṣasūtra)
gnyug sems zur dpyad skor gyi gsung sgros thor bu rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba/
stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (vajravidāraṇīsādhana-nāma)
rdzogs pa chen po sku gsum ye shes lnga'i don bshad pa nyi zla kha sbyor seng ge sgra yi dgongs pa bshad pa'i rgyud
'phags pa snying rje chen po'i pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-mahākaruṇāpuṇḍarīka-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs sAts+tsha la brten nas tshe sring ba'i man ngag dang bcas pa
kye'i rdo rje bsdus pa'i don gyi rgya cher 'grel pa (hevajrapiṇḍārthaṭīkā)
zab mo rdzogs chen sde gsum gyi cha lag:_rigs gsum sgyu 'phrul 'dus pa'i phyag 'tshal
nyang gter bde gshegs 'dus pa'i phyag rgya rkyang sgrub dang hU~M sgrub rgyun khyer bklag chog tu bkod pa bde chen snying po
dri med rnam gnyis kyi mchod rten bzhengs skabs nyer mkho'i zin bris gzhan phan zla snang /

skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud (jātakamāla)
bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba (amṛtādhiṣṭhāna-nāma)
spu gri dmar po snying gi rgyud le'u bdun pa
thugs rje chen po pad+ma sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/_'gro don nang gi smin grol gyi phrin las gsal bar byed pa grol ba bzhi ldan
'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa ([āryaṣaṇmukhīdhāraṇīvyākhyāna])
yang gter thugs rje chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs (trailokyavijayasādhana)
dam chos sprul sku snying thig las:_bstan srung chen po zhing skyong kun dga' gzhon nu yab yum gyi:_las byang gnam lcags me'i 'khor lo dgra bgegs rdul rlog
rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal gso'i gnas gsum dge ba gsum gyi don khrid byang chub lam bzang /
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba (vajravidāraṇā-nāma-dhāraṇīvyākhyāna-vajrāloka-nāma)

zla gsang nag po'i rgyud dang 'jam dpal khros pa'i rgyud/_slob dpon ba su d+ha ra'i rgya gzhung gi man ngag bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed khro chu dug gdong gi las byang bsnyen sgrub srung zlog gi dmigs rim ngag 'don rgyun khyer nyung ngur bsdus pa khro chu gnam lcags go mtshon
yang dag rig byed ces bya ba phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa (samyagvidyākāra-nāma-uttaratantravyākhyāna)
dmag dpung gzhom pa'i thabs ([camūdhvaṃsanopāya])
khu byug rol pa'i rgyud
byin rlabs bla sgrub sdug bsngal mun sel thugs rje'i nyi 'od phyi nang gsang gsum nyams su len pa'i zin bris bklag chog tu bkod pa yon tan 'byung gnas
slob dpon pad+ma rgyal pos mdzad pa'i btsan gyi mdos phran bklag chog tu bsdebs pa
rnam 'joms ba ri lugs kyi sgrub thabs dang khrus chog
lam zab le'u bdun ma
khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud (krodhavijayakalpaguhyatantra)
rta mgrin dregs pa dbang sdud kyi sgrub thabs
thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs 'khor ba dong sprug gi dbang rgyas pa bskur thabs 'gro don kun khyab
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i don yongs su shes pa (prajñāpāramitāhṛdayārthaparijñāna)
byang chub kyi sems mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i 'grel bshad gsang bdag dga' rab dpa' bo'i dgongs rgyan/
dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs (śrī-mahākāla-nāma-dhāraṇī)
nges shes rin po che'i sgron me'i tshig gi don gsal ba'i 'grel chung blo gros snang ba'i sgo 'byed/
thabs dang shes rab gtan la phab pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba (prajñopāyaviniścayasamudaya-nāma)
zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba ([avamānapradīpa-nāma])
chos gling rtsa gsum brgyud 'debs
yum chen gcod kyi brgyud pa'i bskang ba/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa rgyad pa (ārya-avalokiteśvara-nāma-aṣṭaśataka)
rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum gyi/_bka' gter srung ma'i zur rgyan
dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyud kyi de kho na nyid rab tu brtan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel (śrī-vajraḍākatantrasyatattvasusthira-nāma-pañjikā)
'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs (ārya-mahāvajrameruśikharakūṭāgāra-dhāraṇī)
snga 'gyur rnying lugs theg dgu'i lam khrid kyi sa bcad nyung ngu dam pa'i zhal lung /
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa (vajravidāraṇā-nāma-snānavidhivṛtti)
rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i dka' 'grel de kho na nyid rgyas pa zhes bya ba (ḍākinīvajrajālapañjaratantrarājasya pañjikā-tattvapauṣṭika-nāma)
dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel (śrīvajramaṇḍalālaṃkāramahātantrapañjikā)
'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa (lokeśvaraśatakastotra)
dpal spyi mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor nyi ma gsal bar byed pa'i legs bshad gzi ldan 'char kha'i 'od snangazhes bya ba glegs bam gnyis pa /
rtsa gsum dgongs 'dus gsol 'debs
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdus pa khu byug rtsa ba'i rgyud
'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba (ārya-jayavatī-nāma-mahāvidyārājā)
sha ba ru 'dzings kyi rgyud
thig le 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/
'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed ba zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
dga' rab rdo rje'i snying thig las/_yi dam khro bo'i sgrub pa'i dbang gi cho ga rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'beb
ma hA gu ru gsang mtshan thugs sgrub drag por sgrub pa'i dbang bskur gyi cho ga lag len du bsdebs pa zab gsang 'dod 'jo
dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (saddharmapuṇḍarīka-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
sgrol ma maN+dal bzhi pa'i cho ga klu dbang dgongs rgyan skabs bshams bkod legs bshad kyi gsung /
shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (prajñāvardhanī-nāma-dhāraṇī)
lha mo nag mo sku gcig ro ga nag mo'i rgyud
kha sarpa ṇa'i sgrub thabs (khasarpaṇasādhana)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi cha lag rig 'dzin rdo rje gro lod kyi sgrub thabs dam sri gdug pa tshar gcod
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs (vajrayoginīsādhana)
dgongs gter thugs kyi klong gsal gyi bka' brgyad lus dkyil 'don cha bsgrigs pa yod
'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-cundedevī-nāma-dhāraṇī)
'jam dpal dmar po'i sngags rgyud kyi rgyal po
mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig
dwags po gsang lam bla sgrub kyi zin bris nyung gsal go bder bkod pa ye shes rang gsal
gu ru drag po yang gsang bla med me rlung 'khyil ba'i gtor dbang byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i snying po
byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa (bodhisattvamārgakramasaṃgraha)
'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo (ārya-mahāśrīya-sūtra)
rdor sems thugs kyi sgrub pa'i rmi lam gyi khrid yig zin bris su spel ba nying 'khrul rang grol
so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs (mahāpratisarāsādhana)
dham tshig rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsang ba
kun tu bzang po che ba rang la gnas pa'i rgyud
rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che thar par bgrod pa'i lam spyi'i lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam thar pa'i gru chen
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo snying po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (śrī-kālacakragarbhālaṅkārasādhana-nāma)
phywa phrin nor bu mchog rgyal lag tu blang ba'i zur 'debs kyi yi ge nor bu'i sgron me
bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher bshad pa (śrivajradharasaṃgītabhagavatstotraṭīkā)
byang gter rdzogs chen dgongs pa zang thal zhi khro'i lhan thabs
ye shes mar me'i rgyud
gsang ba 'dus pa
snga 'gyur bstan pa rgyas pa'i smon lam chos rgyal dgyes pa'i zhal lung
rig 'dzin chen po ku ma rA dza'i rnam thar lo rgyus dang bcas pa/
zhing skyong dur khrod ma mo'i be bum gyi dpe ris
khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud
'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa (ārya-anantamukhanirhāradhāraṇīvyākhānakārikā)
dam chos snying po skor lnga las:_yi dam bka' 'dus snying po
dpal pad ma dbang chen dregs pa tshar gcod gyi rgyud
sprul sku rat+na gling pa'i gter byon mnyam gnyis rtsal 'gran 'ching gsum gnad kyi gdams pa
gu ru skyes mchog tshul bzang gi nor sgrub rin chen bum bzang gi brgyud 'debs byin rlabs 'dod dgu'i char 'beb
khog gzhung gsal sgron/
lha brag gter byon las khyung gi 'phrin las gnam lcags rdo rje'i thog mda'
'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje'i phrin las pho nya myur mgyogs
sde gsum smon lam grub gnyis rin chen gru char
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor cho ga (śrīkālacakramaṇḍalavidhi)
mdo sde'i rgyan gyi 'grel bshad (sūtrālaṃkāravṛttibhāṣya)
dge 'dun spyan drang ba (saṃghāmantraṇa)
sman mchod cung zad
dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i yan lag las sgrub pa'i lha gsum gyi byin rlabs bya ba'i tshul bklag chog tu bkod pa
gnas brtan lo rgyus mdor bsdus
rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs
rin po che sgom pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba (ratnabhāvanāpradīpa-nāma)
thugs rje sgrol ma las sna tshogs pa'i sgrub thabs (karuṇatārāviśvakarmasādhana)
dpal gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje me 'bar gyi rnal 'byor gsum dril snying po
gnas brtan phyag mchod dang 'brel bar cho ga mdor bsdus bya tshul/
'jam dpal gshin rje 'khrul 'khor nag po sdig pa snying 'dzings gsang ba'i rgyud
zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba (asaṃbandhasargadṛṣṭi-nāma)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi cha lag_/mi g.yo ba bdud bzhi zil gnon gyi dbang chog bai DUr+Ya'i chu rgyun
bla ma rgyal ba kun 'dus kyi dbang bzhi zab pa'i mthar thug
rtsa pra'i sgrub thabs 'don 'grigs dang bcas pa bltas chog tu bkod pa snang gsal mngon shes 'phrul gyi me long
rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (ucchuṣmajambhalasādhana-nāma)
rdo rje dril thabs kyi mchod pa'i thabs kyi rim pa (vajraghaṇṭapūjāsādhanakrama)
'phags pa kuntu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-samantabhadra-nāma-dhāraṇī)
yon tan rin po che'i mdzod kyi 'grel pa bden gnyis gsal byed zla ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba'i smad cha/
pad+ma gsang ba'i thig le las:_smin byed dbang gi byang bu
slob ma la springs pa'i 'grel pa (śiṣyalekhavṛtti)
de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i rnam par bshad pa (tattvaratnālokavyākhyāna)
rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa (suprabhātaprabhātastotra)
ltung pa bco lnga pa ([pañcadaśāpatti])
zab lam bde gshegs kun 'dus las pad+ma gar dbang tshe dpag tu med pa phyi ltar sgrub pa tshe dbang dang bcas pa bdud rtsi'i char 'beb
gdams ngag gi khyad par (gyi sgrub thabs ) (upadeśaviśeṣasādhana)
chad brtan
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_dpal yang dag he ru ka'i rim gnyis rgyun gyi rnal 'byor
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha snyan brgyud zab mo'i skor las:_o rgyan rin po che'i sgrub thabs dbang dang bcas pa
srid pa'i 'pho ba'i ṭi ka (bhavasaṃkrāntiṭīkā)
rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ([pratiṣṭhāvidhi])
re man+ta'i skong gsol cang shes char 'beb
bla ma yid bzhin nor bu rnam gnyis chu bo gcig 'dus kyi rtsa ba'i dbang lnga gtor dbang dang bcas pa'i yi ge byin rlabs snying po
las tshogs rin chen khang bu las:_lo glud kyi cho ga
sems can tshe śad pa bring ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa padma dbyig sgrub ces bya ba ([kṣīṇasattvāyurdīrghīkaraṇasiddhavidhihiraṇyapadmasiddhi-nāma])
yang zab rtsa gsum kun 'dus las:_khro bo sme ba brtsegs pa'i sgrub thabs dam grib kun sel
de nas gdams ngag gzhan gyi lha lnga legs par bstan par bya ba (athāmnāyāntareṇa pañcadevatoṣiṇī)
ngag 'grol gser gyi lde'u mig gi gzhung mngon rtogs dang bcas pa
bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs (mahāśītavatīsādhana)
mar khu chen po'i bya thabs/
zhi rgyud dang khro rgyud/

o rgyan rje 'bangs nyer lnga 'khor bcas la gsol ba 'debs pa mdor bsdus byin rlabs snying po/

bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi nor sgrub rin chen bum bzang

grub thob chen po'i thugs tig las:_man ngag rdo rje'i tshig rkang

gnam chos thugs gter las/_dzaM lha rigs dgu so so dang /_rigs dgu 'khor mang bcas

sgrub chen bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sngags sgrub nar ma'i dbang chog pad+ma shel phug ma bltas chog tu bsdebs pa dngos grub bum bzang

rdor sems thugs kyi sgrub pa las/_grol lam gsum gyi man ngag lag tu blang ba'i gsal byed rnam grol shing rta

grwa mngon dbang phyug 'bar gyi gter byon phyag rdor gtum chung dmar po'i sgrub thabs sgom lung dang bcas pa
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed king kang nag po'i dgra brub kyi lag len gsal byed las kyi rlung dmar

DA ki'i snyan brgyud zab mo las:_bdud 'dul ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong pa can gyi rgyas pa'i las las lha mo chen mo brtan ma'i sgrub thabs las tshogs dang bcas pa

rtsa gsum 'od gsal snying tig las/_nang sgrub pad+ma'i drwa ba thugs rje chen po'i rgyun khyer
