yi dam dgongs pa 'dus pa'i cha rkyen:_bla ma'i thugs sgrub yid bzhin nor bu'i las byang gdung ba'i gsol 'debs me tog phreng ba
tshe sgrub gnam lcags rdo rje dngos grub kun 'dus las:_bde gshegs sgrub pa bka' brgyad dngos grub snying po
rgyal ba rgya mtsho lha lnga'i gtor dbang bklag chog tu bkod pa zab gsang dgongs 'dus
rtsa gsum dgongs pa 'dus pa las:_rig 'dzin mchog gi sgrub pa
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi ge bgun pa'i sgrub thabs (āryāvalokiteśvarasaptākṣarasādhana)
shes par byed pa'i don 'grel sgron ma ([jñāpakārthavṛttipradīpa])
ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs (kurukullesādhana)
rnal 'byor ma kun tu spyod pa'i bshad sbyar (yoginīsaṃcāryanibandha)
dam chos dgongs pa yang zab chos sde'i 'chi med tshe'i skor las phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi zab dbang bskur ba'i rim pa gsal bar bkod pa rdo rje'i srog sgrub
'phags pa klu sgrub kyi smon lam zhes bya ba (āryanāgārjunapraṇidhāna-nāma)
rdo rje phur pa'i bshad 'bum slob dpon rnam gsum gyi dgongs pa slob dpon pad+mas mkhar chen bza' la gdams pa/_(phur 'grel 'bum nag ces gzhan las khyad par 'phags pa'i thugs kyi ti la ka'o/)
dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo'i rtog pa don thams cad sgrub pa (śrīvajravārāhīkalpasarvārthasādhana)
lha brag thugs sgrub drag po rtsal gyi smin lam dbang gi chu bo chen mo khyer bder bsdebs pa rin chen phra mdzes
sems sde'i mkhas pa bco brgyad kyi glu rdor gling lta ba klong yangs dang bka' ma las btus nas phyung ba dang dbang zin lta bu rje chos blo'i phyag bris dngos las byung ba
sman mchod tshe zab
'byung po'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ba ([bhūtagraha-nirmocakopadeśa])
khros nag gi sgrub thabs dang byin rlabs
rol pa chen po thal ba'i rgyud
gu ru'i mthar thug gsang ba ye shes rang gsal phyi sgrub skor
dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i gsol 'debs
rdzogs pa chen po thig le gsang ba'i nges rgyud
las rab tu 'byed pa klu'i rgyal po rtog pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud
bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba (sugataśāsanaratnavohittha-nāma)

rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa'i las kyi bye brag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bkod pa yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba ([sarvavidyākarmakārakadvicatvāriṃśatkarmaviśeṣavyūhakanakacintāmaṇi-nāma])
bka' 'dus snying po yid bzhin nor bu las:_phyi skor rdzogs pa chen po zhi khro'i las byang rgyud kun nying khu nges don snying po
'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-sarva-antarāyaviśodhanī-nāma-dhāraṇī)
dga' rab rdo rje'i snying tig las/_yi dam zhi ba'i sgrub thabs dang phrin las kyi byang bu khrigs su bsdebs pa bde chen myur lam
mchog gling gshin rje tshe bdag 'gugs byang
smon lam du bya ba ([praṇidhānakriyā])
ngag sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (vāksādhana-nāma)
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha snyan brgyud zab mo'i skor las bde chen zhing gi sgrub thabs 'don cha'o:
dpal phyag na rdo rje dregs pa kun 'dul las:_dgra bo klu la gtad pa'i las
klong gi dkyil 'khor chen po bde 'jam
rdor sems thugs kyi thig le'i zhi ba dang khro bo'i brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'i rol mo
snang byed spu gri'i rgyud
spyan ras gzigs bcu gcig pa'i zhal can gyi sgrub thabs ([ekādaśānanāvalokitasādhana])
thugs rje chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i phrin las lam khyer gyi byang bu don zab dgongs bsgril
ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs (vādirājasādhana)
bde bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po
gtor skul gnam lcags thog mda'
bdag bsrung ba'i gzungs
byang chub sems phyogs chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgyud
gaṇ ṭi'i dus kyi mdo (gaṇḍīsamayasūtra)
yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga (śatākṣaravidhi)
gnod sbyin pa ra tsit ta gsang ba phyi ma'i rgyud
lta ba tha dad pa rnam par phye pa mdor bsdus pa (saṃkṣiptanānādṛṣtivibhāga)
gu ru seng ge sgra sgrog gi sgos sgrub phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i gzhung me lce phreng ba
dpal thams cad gsang ba'i bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma (zhes bya ba ) (śrīsarvarahasyanibandharahasyapradīpa-nāma)
ye shes mgon po'i gsang khrid nag po khros pa'i rgyud las pad+mas bsdus pa
kun thub sgrib shing zhwa srung zhang khrom gter byon phyag len ma
dam sri lte phur nag mo'i mnan pa/
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las:_sde brgyad kyi gdong gtad srung ba
dngos grub grub pa'i sgrub thabs/
dpal mgon po nag po bsgrub pa'i thab' (śrīmahākālasādhana)
gshin rje (gshed) nag po'i sgrub thabs (kṛṣṇayamārisādhana)
o rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma saM b+ha ba'i thugs bcud 'phags ma sgrol ma'i man ngag 'jigs pa kun skyob
rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs (svādhiṣṭhānakramopadeśakasādhana)
'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo (ārya-bhadrakalpikā-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra)
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dbang mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba (vajrayoginyabhiṣekasaṃkṣepa-nāma)
rje btsun sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga ([tārābhaṭṭārikāntarabalividhi])
gter gsar 'chi med rtsa gsum dril sgrub kyi bsnyen yig 'chi ba med pa'i lam bzang
gsang bdag bka' srung gi gtor 'bul chos skyong dgyes byed
rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bsdus pa (vajrayānamūlāpattisaṃgraha)
rdo rje phur pa gsang a don gyi rgyud
gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs (aparājitāsādhana)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gsang ba drug bcu pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
keng rus t'a ra nga'i sgrub thabs (kaṃkālatāraṇasādhana)
dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba (prakāśa-nāma-śrīhevajrasādhana)
chos kyi dung gi ting nge 'dzin 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs (dharmaśaṅkhasamādhimañjuśrīsādhana)
thugs rje chen po sa yi snying po yid bzhin nor bu las:_sbas gnas 'grim pa'i cha rkyen gu ru yid bzhin rnam bzhi'i lo rgyus
phyogs gar 'gro yang mgo thon pa'i gdams pa bka' gsar rnying mdo sngags kun gyi don bsdus khyer bde bar bkod pa
zab bdun bka' srung ye shes mgon po phyag bzhi pa'i dbang bskur bltas chog tu bkod pa byin rlabs sgo 'phar rab 'byed
ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga (āpattideśanāvidhi)
rtsa gsum dgongs 'dus zab mo gter gyi mdzod las/_rig 'dzin tshe yi dbang bskur
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha las lha mo spyi'i las byang
dpal dzaṃ bha la'i sgrub thabs (śrījambhalasādhana)
gshin rje dregs pa 'joms byed kyi las bum sgrub thabs
gag lhog gnyan rims sogs srung ba'i gdams pa
'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (ārya-avikalpapraveśa-nāma-dhāraṇī)
bdag med rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs (nairātmāyoginīsādhana)
sgyu 'phrul lam rim gyi bsdus don 'phrul gyi lde mig
rtsa gsum dril sgrub kyi don dbang gi mtshams sbyor nyung ngur bsdus pa smin byed snying po'i nor bu
gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha las kun thub rgyal mo'i sgrub pa
gsang ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba (guhyatattvaprakāśa-nāma)
bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrug pa'i sgrub thabs ([bhagavadakṣobhyasādhana])
seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud
thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i gnas lung thugs rje'i dpyang thag gis gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga bde chen lam sgron
rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi las byang dregs pa kun 'dul gyi zur 'debs pad+ma rA ga'i phreng ba
pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs
sems rin po che sbyang ba'i lam 'bras (citta-ratnaviśodhanamārgaphala)
thugs sgrub tshe dpag med kyi bsnyen sgrub zin bris dge
'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs (mārīcīsādhana)
chos bdag bar chad sel ba'i chos ka las:_rdo rje phur pa dug gzer reg phung
shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ([āśīrvādagāthā])
klong gsal zhi khro'i gsol 'debs gter gzhung
sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (tārāsādhana)
srog bdag gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud
tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga (gaṇacakravidhi)
gsang 'dus thod phreng rtsal gyi sgos sgrub dang 'brel ba zlum po bzhi dbang
mkha' 'gro snying thig gi bka' srung ma mo srog sgrub ma'i sgrub thabs dbang dang bcas pa
rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs (vajrasūkṣma-apratihata-nāma-dhāraṇī)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa (āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītividhisūtrapiṇḍita)
bla ma rig 'dzin srog sgrub las/_dam sri mnan pa'i gdams pa
rje sgam po pa'i zhal gdams bla sgrub kyi dbang chog smin byed nyi ma'i 'od phreng
go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba (pratipattisāraśatakavivaraṇa-nāma)
'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud
shes rab brtsams pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba (prajñārambhāvadhiparikathā-nāma)

bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i yang snying rig 'dzin gyi sde snod snga 'gyur zab mo rin chen gter gyi mdzod chen po'i chos sde spar du bsgrubs pa'i rtogs brjod lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra dbyangs rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi bla bre
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las/_'jam dpal pha rol rgol 'joms kyi gtor dbang zur bkol gnam lcags zhun thigs
rig 'dzin srog sgrub las/_lan chags chu sgyur
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las:_lha dbang yongs rdzogs bkol byang
bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs (mahāśītavatīsādhana)
bka' brgyad drag po bde gshegs yongs 'dus las:_lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams pa gsang chen ye shes kyi snying po
rgyud thams cad thogs pa med pa'i tshigs legs par sgrub pa ([sarvatantrāpratihatapadasampradhāraṇa])
sgrub thabs kun las btus pa zhes bya ba ([trisamayarājasādhana])
o rgyan rin po ches mdzad pa'i bsang mchod gnam sa snang brgyad bdud rtsi'i sprin phung dgos 'dod char rgyun
yang zlog me'i spu gri'i lo rgyus
dmag zlog nyi shu rtsa lnga las rgyal chen bzhi yi sgrub thabs mchod phrin grong khyer srung ba yul khams mnga' 'bangs su gtad pa'i thabs bcas
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs (vajrayoginīsādhana)
zab bdun bka' srung las mgon gyi sgrub thabs
rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba (bhaṭṭārakamañjuśrīyamāripūjāvidhikrama-nāma)
seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs (siṃhanādasādhana)
theg pa chen po bsdus pa (mahāyānasaṃgraha)
rdzogs chen yang ti nag po gser gyi 'bru gcig pa'i dbang bskur gyi zur 'debs 'jug bde'i lam ston
rgya nag po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (mahācīnakramatārāsādhana)
las grub pa'i rab tu byed pa (karmasiddhiprakaraṇa)
snyan dngags kyi me long (kāvyādarśa)
gzhan don slob ma rjes su bzung ba'i cho ga (śiṣyānugrahavidhi)
sbyin sreg gi cho ga (homavidhi)
de nyid bde ba sgom pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (tattvasukhabhāvanānusāriyogabhāvanopadeśa-nāma)
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (jñānasattvamañjuśryādibuddha-nāma-sādhana)
zab bdun mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i mdos kyi 'gres bya
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa (sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣabhavasitātapatrā-nāma-vṛtti)
dpal pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i byin rlabs gtor ma'i dbang bskur dngos grub kun stsol
ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs (kurukullesādhana)
lcang lo can kyi pho brang gi mdo (āṭānāṭīya-sūtra)
ma mo thugs gsang ba'i rgyud
gu ru'i thugs sgrub snyan brgyud yid bzhin nor bu'i brgyud 'debs
byang chub sems thigs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rgyud
dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i thugs tig bde mchog sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/_smin byed dbang gi cho ga gsal bar byed pa rin chen thigs pa
bal pa tra gsang ba'i rgyud
'phags pa rdo rje gtsug lag 'jhor lo'i rgyud
bstod pa'i phan yon (stutyanuśaṃsā)
sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo (buddha-avataṃsaka-nāma-mahāvaipulya-sūtra)
snyan brgyud phur pa'i smad las dug phur nag po/
phur pa rgyud lugs las sri gnon rgya gram nag po/
tshe dpag med lung lugs kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus dbang chog dang bcas pa/
grub thob chen po'i thugs tig las:_sgrub thabs snying po skor lnga
bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga (amṛtodaya-nāma-balividhi)
dpal he ru ka'i thugs kyi rgyud rgyal po
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las:_mthong grol gyi tsakra bri ba'i yig chung ngo:
'phags ma dug sel ma'i gzungs ([āryajāṅgulīdhāraṇī])
dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la bstod pa (śrīhevajrastotra)
drag po phung byed kyi rgyud
'chi med bdud rtsi bum pa gsang ba'i gnad/_lha sgom kha rgyan dpag bsam ljon shing
dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs (hevajrasādhana)
rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs (vajrasarasvatīsādhana)
dpal yang dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bdud rtsi'i nying khu/
srid pa ma mo sgang shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba'i cho ga gsal bar bkod pa bde chen rol mtsho
'phags pa yi ge drug ma rig pa chen po'i sgrub thabs (āryaṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāsādhana)
rje btsun dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i bstod pa ([sānucaraśrīherukabhaṭṭārakastotra])
dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bsgrub pa'i thabs (śrīcatuḥpīṭhasādhanopāyikā)
gnod sbyin dga' byed kyi sgrub thabs (yakṣanandikarasādhana)
sa bcu'i rnam par bshad pa'i rnam par bshad pa (daśabhūmivyākhyānavyākhyāna)
rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs (āryatārābhaṭṭārikāsādhana)
gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i gdong zor gnam lcags spu gri 'bar ba'i zor dbang gnam lcags 'khor lo dang zor dbang thun mong ma yin pa dkyus gcig tu skur ba'i tshul gnam lcags zhun thig
khro bo rtog pa lha rgyud kyi 'grel pa/
tsha ba'i rims kyis dgra bsad pa'i ral gri'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ([śatrumāradāhajvarakhaḍgacakra-nāma])
sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo (buddha-avataṃsaka-nāma-mahāvaipulya-sūtra)
ting nge 'dzin gyi byin brlabs ([samādhyadhiṣṭhāna])
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa (vajravidāraṇā-nāma-dhāraṇīvṛtti)
su pa'i mtha' rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba (subantaratnākara-nāma)
bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs (śāsanasarvasvasādhana-nāma)
stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba (śūnyatākaruṇādṛṣṭi-nāma)
rnam gsum drag po gshin rje drag sngags gcod pa'i rgyud
bdag med ma'i man ngag ces bya ba (nairātmakopadeśa-nāma)
thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dngos grub dpal ster
thugs rje chen po bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi dbang bskur reg pa don ldan bklag chog tu bsdebs pa u dum+ba ra'i 'dzum zer
dpal tshe bdag nag po'i rgyud
rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs (vajrasarasvatīsādhana)
dzam lha nyer gcig gi skor las dzam nag bka' rgya ma
lung phran tshegs kyi rnam par bshad pa (āgamakṣudrakavyākhyāna)
dpal ldan seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs (śrīsiṃhanādasādhana)
bstan pa thams cad kyi dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bsdus don rin po che'i 'phrul sgo
rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_phyi skor yi dam zhi ba'i sgrub pa
'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa mdo thams cad klags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
tshe sgrub rdo rje phreng ba'i lo rgyus nyi ma'i snying po
dpal bka' 'dus kyi phrin las nar ma rin chen snying po
man ngag rin po che'i bang mdzod dbang sdud nor bu skor gsum gyi gdams pa

mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba (ḍākinīsarvacittādvayācintyajñānavajravārāhi-adhibhāva-tantrarāja-nāma)
sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa (piṇḍīkṛtasādhana)
brtan ma bcu gnyis mdos chen
yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs (ṣaḍaṅganāma-sādhana)
bkra shis brgyad pa'i mchod chog bdud rtsi'i gter bum/
dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi rgyud kyi don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba (śrīsarvabuddhasamayogaḍākinījālaśambaratantrārthaṭīkā-nāma)
'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs (āryamañjuśrī-nāma-sādhana)
zab pa skor bdun las:_phrin las sngon 'gro'i spyi chings
rdo rje srin po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud
gshin rje dmar po'i rlung sgrub las byang
kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud
rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod so so nas bsdus pa'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs (vidyādharapiṭakapratibaddhamañjughoṣasādhana)
rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gzhi bsdu ba ([yogācārabhūmau vastusaṃgrahaṇī])
zab pa skor bdun las:_dbang chen rta mgrin yang phyung dmar po
dpal sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i mchog gi sbyin sreg ye shes snang ba/
sgrol ma 'jigs pa kun skyob dang 'brel ba'i mchod sbyin mdos kyi cho ga nyes pa kun skyob
dpal mchog dang po'i sngags kyi dum bu
(gser yig can)_rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa mchod 'os rang bzhin gyi tshig dus gnad nges pa/
'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sgrub thabs (āryācalasādhana)
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ([āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṃgītipraṇidhānakramopadeśa])
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
klong gsal rdo rje'i snying po las/_rgyal yum rnam par rgyal ma'i phrin las dang rjes gnang /_tshe dbang dang bcas pa khrigs bkod 'chi bdag g.yul rgyal
chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo
rdzogs chen yang ti nag po gser gyi 'bru gcig pa'i khrid yig mdor bsdus pa 'od gsal lam 'jug
'bras bu'i klong /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba (śrī-kālacakramaṇḍalopāyikāvidhi-nāma)
chom rkun bcings pa (corabandha)
las sgrib rgyun gcod kyi sngags brgya pa/__(yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'di kho na'o)
phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba (vajrapāṇisādhana-nāma)
'khor ba gdong sbrug chen po'i rgyud
bla sgrub rtsa ba tshig rkang bdun:_'don thabs pad+ma drwa ba
lhan cig skyes pa'i glu (sahajagīti)
tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa (navazloka)
'gro 'dul gter ston rim par byon pa'i mtshan sdom gsol 'debs byin rlabs sprin phreng
tshe dpag med dwangs ma bcud 'dren gyi dbang chog khrigs su bsdebs pa 'chi med dga' ston
byin dbab pa
dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs (śrīhevajrasādhana)
rtsa ba 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gsang sgrub
rdo rje tsar tsi ka'i sgrub thabs (vajracarcikāsādhana)
yum gzungs ma'i dngos grub chen po'i rgyud
byad 'grol gser gyi lde mig gi nyams len sgrub thabs ngag 'don snying po gsal ba
gtum po dregs pa kun 'dul las:_klu chog nor bu bsam 'phel
drang srong gi nad pa gso thabs las gzhung bdud rtsi'i bum bzang
'phags ma zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag ces bya ba (āryaprajñāpāramitopadeśa-nāma)
ma mo 'khrugs bskang gyi dbu phyogs/
yi ge med pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel ba pad+ma kha 'byed/
dzapa? bskul bsdus pa dang dzapa? kyi sngags byang
dpal ldan zhing skyong ma mo'i las byang 'dod pa'i re skong
'jam dpal gshin rje'i thugs tig las/_phrin las kyi rim pa gsal bar bkod pa ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo
bsam gtan gyi chos drug rnam par bzhag pa'i 'grel pa (dhyānaṣaḍdharmavyavasthānavṛtti)
gsang ba'i rgyud chen po
dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa (triratnastotra)
dgongs gter las rta glud gtang thabs
slob dpon chen po sprul sku pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi bka' 'bum bzhugs pa'i dbu'i phyogs:_chos 'di nyams su len pa'i snying gtam gyi chos yin pas:_thugs su len par mdzod legs s+ho:
nang skor khro bo'i bsnyen dmigs skabs thugs srog dang sngags phreng lug rgyud kyi dpe ris
phyag rgya bsam gtan/
phur pa bcu gnyis kyi rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
thugs rje chen po 'khor ba dong sprug gi rgyud
so dbal gri'i ral ngag man lo'i 'khor ti'i ma ti'i ma te mo lha ldan dpal gcig ma/
bcom ldan 'das ma'i man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa (bhagavatyāmnāyānusāriṇī-nāma-vyākhyā)
slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pa pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi rnam par thar pa yid kyi mun sel/
rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba (śrī-kālacakratantrarājasya-sekaprakriyāvṛitti-vajrapadodghaṭi-nāma)
mgon po g.yul zlog gi mdos kyi zin ris sgron me skor gsum las/_rdzas gsog pa'i sdom byang gsal byed sgron me
dpal birba pa'i tshigs rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa (śrīvirūpapadacaturaśīti)
dam pa rgya gar dang ma cig lab sgron yum chen mo rnams kyi gtor dbang gi kha 'phang rnams/
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rtogs sla zhing mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba (śrīguhyasamājasaṃkṣiptasubodhasādhana-nāma)
gsang spyod mkha' 'gro'i snyan brgyud las/_rten 'brel lha mo brgyad rtsis nad gdon kun sel
rtsod pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa (vādanyāya-nāma-prakaraṇa)
bla ma'i thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi cha lag_/gsang bdag rdo rje be con gyi dbang chog in+d+ra nI la'i chu rgyun
thugs sgrub bde gshegs 'dus pa'i brgyud 'debs
dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag (śrī-mahāmudrātilakaṃ-nāma-yoginī-tantrarāja-adhipati)
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba (śrīcakrasaṃvaramaṇḍalastotra-nāma)
slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang rtsa ba'i bla ma dbyer med pa'i lam zab nyams su len tshul tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga de kho na nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba (śrīcakrasaṃvaramaṇḍalavidhi-tattvāvatāra-nāma)
'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi (vinaya-kṣudraka-vastu)
seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma
dam chos rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_gsang skor yi dam zhi ba'i dbang bskur
'od zer can phyag brgyad ma ser mo'i sgrub thabs (aṣṭabhujapītamārīcīsādhana)
ma hA gu ru mtsho skyes rdo rje sku gsum rigs 'dus las:_lo rgyus sgrub pa dang bcas pa
mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
lta ba'i rim pa bshad pa ([dṛṣṭikramanirdeśa])
rlung gi de nyid kyi do ha'i glu zhes bya ba (vāyutattvadohagītikā-nāma)
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs (mahāyakṣasenāpatinīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇisādhana)
rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa (vajrayānamūlāpattiṭīkā)
sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel sgyu ma can zhes bya ba (mahāmāyātantrasya pañjikāmāyāvatī-nāma)
byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan
lta ba la shan chen po rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i rgyud
dpal ldan 'phags ma rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs (āryaśrīmatkurukullāsādhana)
sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa tshig gsum pa'i rgyud
lta ba'i rim pa bshad pa/
'gugs byang gnubs lugs su grags pa
skye med rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba (ratnāsūkośa-nāma)
rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las:_phyi skor bla ma'i sgrub dbang
rtog pa las gsungs pa'i ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs (kalpoktakurukullāsādhana)
